gts:
3. $BRIX: Utility Token, Distribution & Use Cases

Your NFTs accumulate a utility token (“$BRIX”) which holders can exclusively claim on our website — https://propertys.xyz. The go-live will be announced at the end of 2021.

Every month holders can claim $BRIX for the NFT cards they own. $BRIX is built for one purpose and one purpose only: to enable you to exchange for more NFTs & metaverse objects and exclusive access to events within the Property’s ecosystem.

$BRIX has no other functionality other than within the Property’s ecosystem, and it cannot be purchased from Property’s developers. Property’s developers do not provide or intend to provide a secondary market for $BRIX.

Do not expect monetary gains from $BRIX. $BRIX is not intended to give you financial rewards — it will not “make you money”. $BRIX is intended to be used as a means of exchange for our digital and physical products & events — it may “save you money” that you would otherwise have to pay to acquire these assets.

Claiming $BRIX

Every building has a unique, randomized code that can only be claimed once per period — this prevents double-claiming on an NFT and keeps the tokenomics intact. The $BRIX you can claim depend on your holdings. Every holder regardless of the amount they may own is entitled to $BRIX if they register their holdings for a given period. The period is always a month.

4. Collecting Game: The Mechanics

Before we dive into the mechanics — which are fairly simple — it’s important to understand the distinction between special cards and regular cards and the way these regular cards can combine into pure & impure streets.

Card Tiers Single Houses Forming Pure Combos Forming Impure Combos Special Buildings $BRIX Bonuses

Card Tiers

There are 7 cities and 120 special buildings. The 7 cities are separated into 3 tiers — giving low-high amounts of $BRIX. The 120 special buildings are separated into 20 of 20, 5 of 5, and 1 of 1 cards. Again lower to higher amounts of $BRIX.

Single Houses

A single house — 1 NFT, collects $BRIX as standalone, you do not need to complete any of the combos to collect $BRIX. These combos give bonuses, but should not be the reason anyone is excluded from the Property’s ecosystem.

This is a confounding image because the juicy spinach wonton soup is apparently ruined by a cigarette butt. The large open tea egg at the bottom center intrigues me, as does the white powder next to it. In fact, it took a long time for me to diagnose it as a tea egg. Why did someone ruin the soup with the cigarette without even finishing the soup first?

The reason why the picture can spark such vivid scenarios in me must be due to the realism in its style, constructed using watercolor. This is no small feat technically. The white highlight dots scattered on top of the wontons and spinach contribute to the glossy wetness. The ingenious discoloration on some of the yellowed spinach, a sign of decay and imperfection, makes this soup even more convincing. Chopped spring onions and a fractured leaf of cilantro floating in the foreground invites the tongue to touch them. The brown soup almost looks like there is miso in there, as if smoke is spreading nebulously. The runny egg yolk looks good, but the egg white engulfing is looks disgusting. The contrast of allure and disgust is what makes this picture great.

gts:
WHAT IS A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

Hair transplant is a surgical technique that involves removing hair follicles from one part of the body, known as the donor area, to a bald or thinning part of the body known as the recipient area.

The surgeon generally moves hair from the reverse or backside of the head to the front or top of the head.

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic performs hair transplantation procedures under anesthesia.

Pattern baldness is responsible for the majority of hair loss. This comes down to genetics. The remaining cases are due to a variety of factors, including.

diet

stress

illness

hormonal imbalance

medications

If anyone is looking for Best Hair Transplant Clinic in India then he/she should surely consult VHCA Hair Clinic, because it’s India's first Ayurvedic Hair Clinic.

WHAT HAPPENS DURING A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Clinic is the best hair transplant clinic in India as here doctors have more than 25 plus years of expertise and have performed more than 3000 hair transplants.

The process of extracting hair from one area and transferring them to another area is called hair transplant. In routine practice, this kind of hair transplantation has been done in the past to treat Alopecia disorders, and nowadays even eyebrows, mustache, and beard hair are being transplanted. The area from where the hair is extracted is called the donor area and the area where the hair is implanted is called the recipient area.

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER A HAIR TRANSPLANT?

VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic — the best hair transplant clinic in India after completing the Hair Transplants procedures, gives a follow-up therapy with ayurvedic medicines such as:

Ayurvedic Medicines to support hair growth in hair follicles.

Some anti-inflammatory medicines.

Some medicines o make the healing fast.

Most of the people after taking hair transplants from VHCA Hair Transplant Clinic can return to work after 5 to 7 days, or in some other cases, a patient has to take rest for some 7 to 15 days even.

**Safe Holiday Travel Tips: Data-Driven Insights for a Smooth Journey**

With the holiday season in full swing, travel is at its peak, making it a critical time for ensuring safe and hassle-free trips. According to recent industry reports, there were over 6000 flight cancellations during the busy holiday season, highlighting the importance of proactive planning and preparedness. This data underscores the need for travelers to stay informed and adaptable.

### Mask Effectiveness: A Recent Controversy

The debate over mask effectiveness has been a hot topic in the airline industry. Recently, Southwest Airlines CEO Gary Kelly tested positive for COVID-19 after a maskless hearing. This incident sparked a discussion about the role of masks in preventing the spread of the virus. While some argue that masks are essential for public health, others believe that they can be uncomfortable and lead to a false sense of security. Regardless of the stance, it’s clear that travelers must be prepared for a variety of scenarios and consider the latest health guidelines.

### Recent Industry Challenges

The airline industry has faced numerous challenges in recent months, including staffing shortages and health protocol updates. These issues have led to delays, cancellations, and increased costs for travelers. Airlines are working to address these challenges by implementing new protocols and training staff to ensure a safe and efficient travel experience. However, the ongoing staffing issues have created a strain on the industry, leading to longer wait times and reduced service levels.

### Tips for Safe Holiday Travel

1. **Stay Informed**: Keep an eye on flight status updates and travel advisories. Airlines often provide real-time information on their websites and mobile apps.
2. **Pack Essentials**: Bring a mask, hand sanitizer, and a face shield. These items can be useful in case you need to travel without a mask.
3. **Stay Hydrated**: Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated and avoid dehydration, which can weaken your immune system.
4. **Wear Comfortable Footwear**: Plan to wear comfortable shoes for long flights and layovers.
5. **Be Flexible**: Be prepared for changes in your travel plans. Airlines may cancel flights or change routes due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances.

### Conclusion

Traveling during the holiday season can be both exciting and challenging. By staying informed, prepared, and flexible, you can enjoy a safe and enjoyable journey. Remember, the data-driven approach to travel planning is key to navigating the complexities of the holiday travel season.

---

gts:
6000+ Cancelled flights on the busiest travel time of the year

How do you know who to trust?

Here is a little food for thought.

The airline industry is in the midst of a record-breaking winter crisis, with thousands stranded around Christmas time. As if it wasn’t enough that flights were canceled on top days like Christmas Eve and Christmas day there have been over 1,700 US flights canceled because there are too many employees with positive Covid tests.

(CNN Business) Major US airlines canceled hundreds of more flights Sunday, the third day in a row of mass cancellations and delays over Christmas weekend, as staff and crew call out sick amid the Omicron surge.

This comes on the heels of several airline CEOs telling congress they don’t think masks “add anything” to the safety of flying.

The Airline CEOs were testifying to Congress about how they spent the Covid money they received during the pandemic. They made headlines by questioning the effectiveness of masks on airlines with the results of a study done on mannequins.

According to Forbes.com, the studies the CEOs had referenced were “done with mannequins who were sitting straight forward with masks on, not removing them, not eating at any point in time,” Nelson said. “So it is important to recognize that the safe controlled environment on the plane is a layered safety protocol, which includes the sanitation of the aircraft and includes the service procedures and includes the HEPA filtration that is not on all aircraft, by the way, and it includes everyone wearing the masks.”

Interestingly enough, the CEO of Southwest Airlines Gary Kelly tested positive with Covid-19 two days after appearing at the hearing maskless. He is fully vaccinated, boosted, and still contracted Covid. He didn’t make an informed decision. Don’t be like Gary. Listen to the scientist and the data.

Can face masks help slow the spread of the coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) that causes COVID-19? Yes. Face masks combined with other preventive measures, such as getting vaccinated, frequent hand-washing, and physical distancing, can help slow the spread of the virus.

Mayo Clinic

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

Job Title: Waiter/Waitress — Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

Organization: Mada Hotels

Duty Station: Jinja, Uganda

Mada Hotels Profile

Founded in 1982, Mada Hotels is one of East Africa’s leading hospitality service providers with properties spread throughout East Africa. Adventures Aloft Balloon Safaris is part of Mada services and offers Africa’s most famous game reserves including the Masai Mara, Serengeti and Tarangire National Park. They opened a new property in Namanve, Mukono called Kampala Nile Resort.

Job Summary

Waiters assist restaurant patrons by noting their order, serving tables their requested meals, and preparing bills at the end of the table’s meal. Waiters are also responsible for asking customers if they are satisfied with their meal and providing any assistance should the customer not be satisfied.

To be successful as a waiter you must have the endurance to stand for long hours and have patience with difficult customers. A good waiter anticipates the needs of customers and provides all services in a friendly manner.

Roles and Responsibilities:

- Greet customers and hand out menus.



- Take meal and beverage orders from customers and place these orders in the kitchen.



- Make menu recommendations and inform patrons of any specials.



- Deliver meals and beverages to tables when they have been prepared.



- Check that customers are satisfied with their meal.



- Prepare the bill for tables when requested.



- Cash up bills and ensure that the correct amount has been paid.



- Administer change to tables if needed.

Minimum Qualifications

- The applicant for the Mada Hotels Waiter/Waitress job should hold relevant qualifications



- Experience in the hospitality industry is required

How To Apply for Mada Hotels Jobs 2021

All candidates who wish to join the Mada Hotels in this capacity should Email a complete CV and cover letter to: fnbjnr@madahotels.com Or deliver physical copies to Jinja Nile Resort, Kimaka Road, Jinja, Uganda

Deadline: 25th December 2021

Here is a short article summarizing the study on how Prosecco producers adopted the Rive sub-appellation, focusing on the main factors influencing their decision and the market impact, with a mention of UNESCO recognition:

### Prosecco Producers and the Rive Sub-Appellation: A Study on Adoption and Market Impact

The study on Prosecco producers adopting the Rive sub-appellation provides valuable insights into the factors driving this trend and its market implications. The UNESCO recognition of the Rive sub-appellation as a Geographical Indication (GI) has played a significant role in the region's wine tourism industry. This recognition not only enhances the reputation of Prosecco but also supports the local economy by attracting more visitors to the area.

#### Main Factors Influencing Adoption

1. **UNESCO Recognition**: The UNESCO designation of the Rive sub-appellation as a GI has been a key driver for Prosecco producers. This recognition has elevated the status of Prosecco and has led to increased demand from tourists and wine enthusiasts who are interested in authentic Italian wines. Producers have recognized the value of this recognition and have been proactive in adopting practices that align with the GI standards.

2. **Quality Control**: Producers have focused on improving the quality of their wines to meet the stringent requirements of the GI. This includes using only approved grape varieties, maintaining strict vineyard management practices, and ensuring consistent winemaking techniques. The focus on quality has not only enhanced the reputation of Prosecco but has also attracted premium consumers who are willing to pay a premium for high-quality wines.

3. **Market Trends**: The global trend towards premium wines and the increasing popularity of Italian wines have also influenced Prosecco producers. Producers have responded by diversifying their product range to include higher-priced bottles and by investing in marketing campaigns that highlight the unique qualities of Prosecco. This has led to an increase in sales and a stronger market presence for Prosecco producers in the Rive sub-appellation.

#### Market Impact

The adoption of the Rive sub-appellation by Prosecco producers has had a positive impact on the local economy. The increased demand for Prosecco has led to higher prices and greater profits for producers. This has not only boosted the local economy but has also created more job opportunities in the wine industry. Additionally, the UNESCO recognition has attracted more tourists to the region, further boosting the local tourism industry.

#### Conclusion

The adoption of the Rive sub-appellation by Prosecco producers has been driven by a combination of factors, including the UNESCO recognition, quality control measures, and market trends. The recognition has not only enhanced the reputation of Prosecco but has also had a significant positive impact on the local economy and tourism industry. As Prosecco producers continue to focus on quality and innovation, the Rive sub-appellation is likely to remain a key driver of growth in the region.
</response>
gts:
How do sparkling wine producers adopt a sub-appellation? Evidence from an exploratory study on heroic Prosecco Superiore Rive

Luigino Barisan, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

Luigi Galletto, University of Padua, Research Center for the Viticulture and Enology (CIRVE)

This paper investigates why wineries producing Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Protected Denomination of Origin (CVPP) wines decided to adopt the sub-appellation (SA) “Rive” as a way to increase the value of their wines.

We estimated both a logistic and a linear regression to explain Rive SA firms’ choices and market growth drivers, respectively. By using data gathered from CVPP producers, we divided wineries into two groups, those that have adopted the Rive SA and those that have not. By means of a stepwise procedure, we categorized factors that were likely to explain the Rive SA choice within a set of structural, marketing and wine tourism-related variables.

The results showed that structural drivers such as the human capital of younger producers, pressure tank sizes, competitive positioning in the market and in the field of wine tourism hospitality, and involvement in ad hoc promotional activities (i.e., Primavera del Prosecco) have the greatest effects on the choice of the Rive SA. The synergistic effects of cellar door sales, small firm sizes and specific foreign markets (i.e., the United Kingdom and the United States) have emerged, on the other hand, as vital factors in the growth of the Rive SA in terms of market share.

The adoption of the Rive SA may play an important role in supporting and valuing the heroic viticulture-based economy and may help the CVPP Tutelary Consortium to appropriately undertake promotional strategies to differentiate wines and improve competitiveness. This could have positive effects on wine tourism, hospitality and winery visits in light of the recent recognition of the CVPP as the 55th Italian UNESCO World Heritage site.

DOI: https://doi.org/10.36253/wep-9900

Read Full Text: https://oaj.fupress.net/index.php/wep/article/view/9900

Here is a concise article on public speaking for beginners, including practical examples and a general audience:

### Public Speaking for Beginners: A Step-by-Step Guide

#### Step 1: Brainstorming
Before you start crafting your speech, it's important to gather your thoughts and ideas. Here are some practical tips to help you brainstorm effectively:

1. **Choose a Topic**: Select a topic that is relevant to your audience and interests you. For beginners, it's best to start with topics that are broad and not too specific.
2. **Research**: Gather information about your topic. Use reliable sources like books, articles, and online resources. This will help you build a strong foundation for your speech.
3. **Mind Mapping**: Create a mind map to organize your thoughts. Start with the main idea and branch out into subtopics. This visual tool can help you see the connections between different ideas.
4. **Write Down Ideas**: Write down all your ideas, no matter how small or irrelevant they may seem. You can always refine and discard them later.

#### Step 2: Speech Writing
Once you have a clear idea of what you want to say, it's time to write your speech. Here are some practical tips to help you structure your speech:

1. **Introduction**: Start with an attention-grabbing introduction. You can use a story, a quote, or a question to hook your audience. The introduction should set the tone for the rest of the speech.
2. **Body**: Divide your speech into three main points. Each point should be supported by evidence and examples. Use bullet points to make your speech easy to follow. Here’s an example:
   - **Point 1**: Start with a clear and concise statement. For example, "Public speaking can be a daunting task, but with practice, anyone can improve."
   - **Point 2**: Provide evidence to support your point. For example, "According to a study by Toastmasters International, 95% of people who attend their meetings improve their public speaking skills."
   - **Point 3**: Conclude your point with a call to action. For example, "To become a better public speaker, practice regularly and seek feedback from others."
3. **Conclusion**: End your speech with a strong conclusion. Summarize your main points and leave your audience with a memorable message. For example, "In conclusion, public speaking is a skill that can be mastered with dedication and practice. Keep practicing and you will see improvement."

#### Step 3: Practicing
Practice is crucial to becoming a confident public speaker. Here are some practical tips to help you practice effectively:

1. **Rehearse**: Practice your speech multiple times. Start with a rough draft and refine it as you go. Record yourself to listen to your delivery and make necessary adjustments.
2. **Feedback**: Seek feedback from friends, family, or colleagues. They can provide valuable insights and help you identify areas for improvement.
3. **Improvise**: Practice improvising your speech. This will help you stay calm and confident during actual presentations. You can use prompts or random topics to practice on the spot.
4. **Visualize**: Visualize yourself delivering your speech successfully. Imagine the audience listening intently and responding positively. This can boost your confidence and reduce anxiety.

#### Step 4: Visualization
Visualization is a powerful tool to help you prepare for public speaking. Here are some practical tips to help you visualize your success:

1. **Create a Mental Image**: Imagine yourself standing in front of your audience, delivering your speech with confidence and poise. Visualize the audience engaging with you and responding positively.
2. **Use Positive Affirmations**: Repeat positive affirmations to yourself. For example, "I am prepared and confident. I can deliver a great speech."
3. **Relaxation Techniques**: Practice relaxation techniques like deep breathing or progressive muscle relaxation. This can help you stay calm and focused during your presentation.
4. **Positive Visualization**: Visualize yourself succeeding in your public speaking endeavors. Imagine yourself receiving applause and positive feedback from your audience. This can boost your confidence and reduce anxiety.

By following these four steps—brainstorming, speech writing, practicing, and visualization—you can become a more confident and effective public speaker. Remember, practice makes perfect, and with time and dedication, you can master the art of public speaking.
</response>

Step 1: Brainstorming and Formulation of Ideas

The tone and the information should be understandable to the particular audience you are speaking to. Try to answer the obvious questions and build a relationship from early on.

Learn as much as possible about the topic and use common questions to expand your learning horizon.

Step 2: Speech Writing

In the beginning, the first thing you must do is to write down topics you want to focus on in bullet points with one or two sentences.

When writing distinguish three clear parts as Introduction, Description, and Conclusion. Here are some tips:

Startup with a curious fact, a Dramatic question, a quote, or a Story.

Be positive.

Make it short. Around 20 minutes.

The audience must know the problem and the proposed solution by the end.

Summarize before you finish.

Follow up with a motivating or inspiring finish.

Step 3: Practicing

The target is being natural while speaking. An occasional glance at your notes should be enough to remember. Here are some tips for practicing:

Practice in front of a mirror a few times. Get feedback from a friend.

Audiences are eager to hear what you have to say. So be clear and prompt.

Relevant gestures, occasional movement, and eye contact are very impactful. So use them often.

Keep your notes on the podium, and walk around.

Step 4: Visualize

Visualization of your topic and related things can be a very powerful thing if you do it right. Use PowerPoint presentations, photos, charts, and videos to make your point.

Here is a 500-word article on the Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule, focusing on the 1992 World Cup incident and the 2003 World Cup controversy involving South Africa:

### The Duckworth-Lewis Rule: A Game-Theoretic Analysis

The Duckworth-Lewis (D/L) rule is a method used in cricket to determine the winner of a match when the scheduled number of overs is reduced due to weather or other unforeseen circumstances. This rule was introduced in 1992 to address the issue of how to fairly determine the winner in such situations, ensuring that the match is not unfairly prolonged. The rule has been controversial, especially in the context of the 1992 World Cup and the 2003 World Cup, where it played a significant role in the outcomes of several matches.

#### The Basics of the D/L Rule

The D/L rule is based on a mathematical model that takes into account the total runs scored by both teams, the number of overs each team has faced, and the number of overs remaining. The rule aims to balance the advantage of the team that has scored more runs with the advantage of the team that has faced more overs. The D/L method calculates the target score for the team batting second based on the probability of the team batting second winning the match if the game were to continue to the end.

#### The 1992 World Cup Incident

The 1992 World Cup was the first major international cricket tournament to use the D/L rule. In the final match between Australia and England, Australia was batting first and had scored 312 runs in 48 overs. England, batting second, had scored 225 runs in 40 overs. The D/L rule was applied, and England was given a target of 22 off 1 ball. This target was considered impossible to achieve, and England was declared the winner. This incident highlighted the complexity and potential unfairness of the D/L rule, as it seemed to give an unfair advantage to the team batting second.

#### The 2003 World Cup Controversy

The 2003 World Cup saw another controversial use of the D/L rule. In the semi-final match between South Africa and Sri Lanka, South Africa was batting first and had scored 282 runs in 40 overs. Sri Lanka, batting second, had scored 270 runs in 38 overs. The D/L rule was applied, and Sri Lanka was given a target of 22 off 1 ball. This target was again considered impossible to achieve, and Sri Lanka was declared the winner. This incident further highlighted the complexity of the D/L rule and its potential to influence the outcome of matches.

#### Hariprasath's Critique

Hariprasath, a cricket analyst, has critiqued the D/L rule for its complexity and potential to create unfair advantages. He argues that the rule is based on a simplified model that does not take into account the nuances of cricket, such as the skill levels of the teams, the pitch conditions, and the weather. Hariprasath suggests that the D/L rule should be replaced with a more sophisticated model that takes into account these factors, ensuring a more fair and balanced outcome for all teams.

### Conclusion

The Duckworth-Lewis rule has been a controversial part of cricket, particularly in the context of the 1992 World Cup and the 2003 World Cup. The rule has been used to determine the winner of matches when the scheduled number of overs is reduced, but it has also been criticized for its potential to create unfair advantages. Hariprasath's critique of the rule's complexity highlights the need for a more sophisticated model that takes into account the nuances of cricket. The D/L rule remains a necessary tool in cricket, but its application must be carefully considered to ensure that it does not unfairly influence the outcome of matches.
</response>

For example, if a rain delay means that Team 2 only has 70% of resources available, and Team 1 scored 220 with 100% of resources available, then 220 × 70% / 100% = 154, so Team 2’s target is 154, and the score to tie is 153. The actual resource values used in the Professional Edition are not publicly available, so a computer that has this software loaded must be used.

Sure, here’s a concise article on 'Accounts from Incomplete Records' in under 500 words:

### Accounts from Incomplete Records

Accounts from incomplete records refer to financial records that do not provide a complete picture of a company's financial health. This can occur due to various reasons such as missing entries, errors, or incomplete documentation. Incomplete records can lead to inaccurate financial statements and hinder effective financial decision-making.

#### What It Means

Incomplete records are financial documents that lack the necessary information to fully reflect a company's financial position. This can include missing entries, incorrect data, or incomplete documentation. For example, if a company fails to record a transaction or if there are errors in the recorded entries, the resulting financial statements will not accurately represent the company's financial status.

#### Why It's Used

Incomplete records are often used in situations where there is a lack of proper documentation or when the company is in the process of transitioning to a more comprehensive accounting system. However, it is crucial to address and correct incomplete records as soon as possible to ensure accurate financial reporting.

#### Comparison to the Double-Entry System

The double-entry system is a fundamental principle in accounting that ensures every transaction is recorded in two accounts: one as a debit and one as a credit. This system helps maintain the balance of the accounting equation (Assets = Liabilities + Equity). In contrast, accounts from incomplete records do not follow this principle and can lead to imbalances and inaccuracies in financial statements.

#### How to Address Incomplete Records

To address incomplete records, companies should:

1. **Review and Correct Entries**: Regularly review financial records and correct any errors or missing entries.
2. **Implement a Comprehensive System**: Transition to a more robust accounting system that ensures all transactions are recorded accurately.
3. **Document Procedures**: Establish clear procedures for recording transactions and maintaining financial records.
4. **Regular Audits**: Conduct regular audits to ensure the accuracy of financial records.

By addressing incomplete records, companies can improve the reliability of their financial statements and make better-informed decisions based on accurate financial data.
</response>
gts:
Accounting records, which aren’t strictly kept consistent with the double-entry bookkeeping system are referred to as Accounts from incomplete records. Many authors describe it as a single entry system.

However, a single-entry bookkeeping system may be a misnomer because there’s no such system for maintaining accounting records. It is also not a ‘shortcut’ method as an alternate to the double-entry bookkeeping system. It is rather a mechanism of maintaining records whereby some transactions are recorded with proper debits and credits while just in the case of others, either one-sided or no entry is formed.

Accounts from Incomplete Records

Normally, under this technique records of money and private accounts of debtors and creditors are properly maintained, while the knowledge concerning assets, liabilities, expenses and revenues is partially recorded. Hence, these are usually referred to as accounts from incomplete records.

For more details please visit:https://www.manishco.com/accounts-from-incomplete-records/

Here’s an article about finding good places to warm up as a singer or speaker, especially for people who feel self-conscious practicing in public or shared spaces, along with tips for overcoming embarrassment and specific strategies for singers traveling in hotels:

### Finding Good Places to Warm Up as a Singer or Speaker

#### 1. **Public Spaces with Good Acoustics**
   - **Libraries and Museums:** These spaces often have good acoustics and are less likely to disturb others. They are also quiet and conducive to focused practice.
   - **Community Centers:** Many community centers offer rooms for practice and have good acoustics. They are often free or have reasonable fees.

#### 2. **Private Practice Spaces**
   - **Home Studio:** If you have a home studio, it’s a great place to practice. You can control the environment and have privacy.
   - **Local Recording Studios:** If you have access to a recording studio, it’s a professional and private space for practice.

#### 3. **Online Platforms**
   - **YouTube Live:** You can record yourself and watch the playback. This is a great way to get feedback and practice in a controlled environment.
   - **Social Media Groups:** Join groups on platforms like Facebook or Instagram where you can share your practice sessions and get feedback from others.

### Overcoming Embarrassment When Others Might Hear Warmups

#### 1. **Gradual Exposure**
   - **Start Small:** Begin with short warmups in small, quiet spaces. Gradually increase the duration and the number of people present.
   - **Practice in Front of a Mirror:** This can help you feel more comfortable and confident.

#### 2. **Positive Self-Talk**
   - **Affirmations:** Use positive affirmations to boost your confidence. Repeat phrases like “I am ready” or “I am prepared.”
   - **Visualization:** Visualize yourself performing well in public. This can help reduce anxiety and build confidence.

#### 3. **Professional Guidance**
   - **Private Lessons:** Consider taking private lessons with a professional. They can provide personalized feedback and help you build confidence.
   - **Workshops:** Attend workshops or masterclasses where you can practice in a supportive environment.

### Specific Strategies for Singers Traveling in Hotels

#### 1. **Hotel Rooms**
   - **Choose a Quiet Room:** Look for a hotel room that is away from the main lobby and has a good acoustics. Some hotels offer rooms with soundproofing.
   - **Use a Headset:** If you have a headset, use it to practice without disturbing others. This can also help you focus better.

#### 2. **Local Practice Spaces**
   - **Community Centers:** Many hotels have community centers or gyms where you can practice. These spaces are often free or have reasonable fees.
   - **Local Parks:** If you’re staying in a city, local parks can be great for practicing. They are often quiet and have good acoustics.

#### 3. **Online Platforms**
   - **YouTube Live:** Record yourself and watch the playback. This is a great way to get feedback and practice in a controlled environment.
   - **Social Media Groups:** Join groups on platforms like Facebook or Instagram where you can share your practice sessions and get feedback from others.

By following these tips, you can find the right place to warm up and overcome any embarrassment when practicing in public or shared spaces. Whether you’re a singer or a speaker, these strategies can help you feel more confident and prepared.
</response>
gts:
A lot of you might live in apartments with thin walls and feel embarrassed about singing and especially practicing those vocal exercises comfortably where others can here you. I know many of you resort to practicing in the car.

Some of you, are regular travelers and need to find a place whilst on the road, where you can still exercise the voice without feeling inhibited…staying in hotels.

When on stage for a performance, this is the part of us that we are happy to show to the world. The finished product. But the preparation to get us ready to be there, where we might make mistakes, we are experimenting, learning, warming up, trying new material…that is commonly the side of singing and public speaking which is not a public affair. We need to find a place where we are comfortable to perform these tasks.

As a singer and speaker, and particularly, someone who is establishing new techniques, it is important to exercise the voice on a daily basis. Your voice coach will hopefully have given you exercises to improve your breathing, strengthen your vocal cords, improve your range, pitch and vocal stamina.

So can you get over the phobia of practising when other people might hear you?

Firstly, I say…don’t be shy to be warming up your voice. It’s part of the preparation and it’s what will make you sound awesome on stage, and in everyday life as well as a speaker. If your a singer or a public speaker and your your good enough to have a gig, anyone hearing your warmups will not be thinking…oMg what an awful singer next door. Quite the opposite. Be bold and do what you have to do. Invite your neighbours to your gigs, rehearsals or to hear your run through your presentation or keynote.

Same when you are in a hotel. Who cares…you will most likely not have to see these guests again.

As for practicing in your car. It’s not a bad idea. Posture is not the best. But if you feel you have more privacy here and will be more effective then, it’s better than nothing at all. I do however recommend that you pull over and practice for the 10–20mins on the side of the road. Singing and vocalisation exercises can take quite a lot of concentration and some people even find the breathing can make them feel dizzy, so driving at the same time is not recommended.

Mariners lifer, Kyle Seager is closing the MLB chapter of his career. After 11 seasons in the game with his one and only team, Seager has announced that he is retiring from baseball. Gianmarco Castronovo reflects on the 3rd baseman’s career:

Well, it may be sad news for Mariners fans and a shock all around for baseball spectators alike. But for Kyle Seager, who announced his retirement on Wednesday with a Twitter post from his wife, Julie Seager — the career-long Mariner is “unbelievably excited for the next chapter of [his] life.”

Gianmarco Castronovo is sad to see Kyle Seager go from the game. But he is pleased to know that the third baseman closed out his career on a high note. 2021 was a strong season for Seager, who hit 35 home runs with 101 RBIs — career highs for the 34-year-old soon-to-be MLB retiree. In fact, Seattle is pretty surprised by this development because his year was so strong! Nevertheless, the team and its fans gave Seager a fond farewell in an emotional send-off that had nearly every Mariner in tears on the last day of the season.

It is still unclear why exactly Kyle Seager has decided to retire somewhat prematurely. Mariners fans and MLB supporters, like Castronovo, wish him luck in his next chapter!

gts:
RKI urges “maximum contact restrictions”

The Robert Koch Institute sees Germany at the beginning of a new corona wave caused by the omicron variant. Now the RKI advises clear measures — “immediately” and until next year. Mochi Dec 21, 2021·3 min read

spiegel.de 21.12.2021–12:55 a.m.

Translated by Michele Corlito

RKI head Lothar Wieler Photo: ANNEGRET HILSE / REUTERS

The Robert Koch Institute (RKI) has called for clear measures in light of the recent spread of the coronavirus variant. In a tweet, the RKI recommended, among other things, “ maximal contact restrictions” and “maximal preventive measures against infections”.

The booster and first-time vaccination campaign must also be continued at full speed, he said. Travel should be reduced to what is absolutely necessary. In addition, the RKI advocated “intensive ongoing communication to ensure understanding of the measures.

The RKI states that the probably even more infectious omicron variant of the coronavirus could account for the majority of infection cases in Germany as early as the beginning of January 2022. Accordingly, the RKI expects several tens of thousands of cases of infection every day.

Contact restrictions planned from December 28

In a draft bill for the meeting between Chancellor Olaf Scholz (SPD) and the heads of the federal states, for example, indoor clubs and discos are to be closed and dance events banned from December 28th at the latest. Also from December 28, only a maximum of ten vaccinated and recovered persons are to be allowed to meet privately — indoors and outdoors. Children 14 and under are not to be counted. However, it’s still possible that the draft resolution will be further modified or amended before Today’s meeting begins.

Sure, here’s a concise article on Facebook ad analysis with a focus on key steps, metrics, and the funnel perspective, including the thumbnail effectiveness formula and how scroll-stopping impacts the rest of the funnel:

### Facebook Ad Analysis: Key Steps and Metrics

#### Introduction
Facebook ads are a powerful tool for reaching and engaging cold audiences. Understanding the key steps and metrics to evaluate ads is crucial for optimizing your campaigns. This article will cover the essential steps to evaluate Facebook ads and the metrics you should focus on, with a special emphasis on the funnel perspective and the effectiveness of thumbnails.

#### Key Steps to Evaluate Ads
1. **Set Clear Objectives**: Define what you want to achieve with your ads. Whether it’s increasing brand awareness, driving website traffic, or boosting sales, clear objectives will guide your evaluation.
2. **Create High-Quality Content**: Ensure your ads are visually appealing and align with your brand’s voice. High-quality content can significantly impact engagement and conversion rates.
3. **A/B Testing**: Regularly test different ad variations to see which performs better. This helps you identify the most effective elements and refine your strategy.
4. **Monitor Performance Metrics**: Track key metrics such as click-through rate (CTR), conversion rate, and cost per acquisition (CPA) to gauge the effectiveness of your ads.
5. **Adjust and Optimize**: Use the data from your performance metrics to make informed decisions and optimize your ads accordingly.

#### Metrics to Focus On
1. **Click-Through Rate (CTR)**: The percentage of people who click on your ad after seeing it. A higher CTR indicates better ad relevance and engagement.
2. **Conversion Rate**: The percentage of people who complete the desired action (e.g., make a purchase, sign up for a newsletter) after clicking on your ad.
3. **Cost Per Acquisition (CPA)**: The average cost to acquire a new customer through your ads. Lower CPA is generally better.
4. **Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)**: The ratio of revenue generated from your ads to the cost of running them. A higher ROAS indicates better ad performance.
5. **Engagement Rate**: The percentage of people who interact with your ad (e.g., like, comment, share). High engagement can lead to increased brand awareness and customer loyalty.

#### Funnel Perspective
When evaluating Facebook ads, consider them as the first touchpoint in the customer journey. A well-performing ad can set the stage for a successful conversion. Here’s how each metric fits into the funnel:

1. **Awareness Stage**: High CTR and engagement rates indicate that your ad is reaching and engaging the right audience.
2. **Consideration Stage**: Conversion rate is a key metric here. A high conversion rate suggests that your ad is effectively driving users to take the desired action.
3. **Purchase Stage**: CPA and ROAS are crucial for measuring the overall success of your campaign. A low CPA and high ROAS indicate that your ad is not only reaching the right audience but also converting them effectively.

#### Thumbnail Effectiveness Formula
The thumbnail effectiveness formula is a simple yet effective way to measure the impact of your ad’s thumbnail. It is calculated as follows:
\[ \text{Effectiveness} = \frac{\text{3-second video plays}}{\text{Total video plays}} \]
A higher effectiveness percentage indicates that your thumbnail is more engaging and likely to drive more clicks.

#### Scroll-Stopping and the Funnel
Scroll-stopping refers to the ability of your ad to keep users engaged and scrolling through your page. If your ad is scroll-stopping, it means users are more likely to stay on your page and engage with other elements, such as your call-to-action (CTA) and product details. Scroll-stopping can have a significant impact on the rest of the funnel:
1. **Increased Engagement**: Users who scroll through your page are more likely to engage with your content, leading to higher conversion rates.
2. **Higher CTR**: Scroll-stopping can increase the CTR of your ad, as users are more likely to click on your ad if they are already engaged with your page.
3. **Better Brand Perception**: A well-optimized page that keeps users engaged can improve your brand’s perception and drive more conversions.

#### Conclusion
Evaluating Facebook ads requires a comprehensive approach that includes setting clear objectives, creating high-quality content, and regularly testing different ad variations. Focus on key metrics such as CTR, conversion rate, and CPA to gauge the effectiveness of your ads. By considering the funnel perspective and the effectiveness of thumbnails, you can optimize your ads for better performance. Scroll-stopping is a crucial factor that can impact the rest of the funnel, so ensure your ads are engaging and keep users on your page.

Feel free to reach out if you have any further questions or need more detailed guidance.
</response>

Facebook

KNOW WHAT TO LOOK FOR!

Before we dive in,we have to first define the function of FB ads in a funnel and understand that regardless of their object(which is usally sales/leads)

Ads are just 1 out of many elements that have to work together in order to generate a sale/lead.

From this perspective,we look at cold audience ads as the initial contact with (your) brand,and as such — their function is to:

Grab attention relay the message(offer,product etc…) peak the audience interest push the traffic to the landing page

STEP 1:

Is your video ad stopping scrolls?

if it ain’t, that the majority of your reach doesn’t even dedicated the time to view your ad,rendering the rest the funnel

RELEVENT METRICS:

Reach Video Plays Second Video Plays

WHAT IF YOU DONT MEET THESE CRITERIA?

If your ad isn’t stopping scrolls,that points toward the following:

Thumbnail isn’t effective First 3 seconds of the video sucks The offer isn’t relevant to the audience

STEP 2 :

Is your thumbnail effective?

usually, we will test at least 5–10 thumbnails in order to determine this,butif you haven’t conducted an A/B test, here is how you can be more certain that the thumbnails is ineffective

RELEVANT MATRICS:

Reach Video plays 3-second video plays Thumb effectiveness

FORMULA:

3-second video/video plays=Effectiveness%

Anything below 35% is not as optimized as it should be,and it will most likely prove inferior in stopping the scrolls.

THIS DOSEN’T MEAN IT WON’T GENERATE SALES, IT JUST MEANS IT COULD DO BETTER!

THANK YOU, HAVE A NICE DAY!

For Instagram growth in 2022, there are a few things that you need to keep in mind.

Instagram has rolled out some new reel features like replying with reels, and it’s constantly pushing new effects for reel videos and also asking people to show up on videos and reels.

With this constant push towards IG Live and Reels formats, making videos will remain the top way to grow on IG in 2022.

For 2022 I believe the ability to create quality videos is going to be very important. Either by yourself or through software.

Use reels and IGTV the most.

For a new account starting in 2022, here are the things you can follow;

Learn what type of videos is trending already in your niche.

To do this:

Analyze some top influencers and their content.

Use Viralspy for checking out your competitor’s post and account. You’ll get the engagement rates and top hashtags they use.

You can use this to figure out what content to create to grow faster.

Keep in mind that the content that you create must be similar to them. Apart from niche, how you create content also matters.

If you will create dancing videos like influencers, check influencers’ accounts on Viralspy.

If you will create videos through video apps, check out accounts that are creating content like that.

Because hashtag ranks video content that is similar to each other, you need to create similar videos to get a higher reach. That’s how you can hop on trends.

Now, once you know what video content is working out best for you, focus on Carousels and single slide posts to get the mix of content.

Carousels are a great way to share valuable content. If you’re in the educational field, carousels will help you convert the new people who come across your account into followers.

Here again, try to make the best design along with sharing valuable content.

Try to maintain a brand identity for the long term.

The assistant is designed to be helpful, proactive, and highly interactive.

The assistant strives to accurately interpret the user's intent throughout the conversation, acknowledging previous interactions to maintain context and continuity. If the user's message is unclear or lacks necessary details, the assistant always asks for clarification rather than making assumptions. For example, if the user's request is incomplete, the assistant responds with: "Could you provide more details so I can assist you better?"

The assistant asks specific follow-up questions and offers suggestions based on the user's needs, avoiding vague or generic prompts. It proactively provides guidance and potential next steps, especially in complex tasks such as writing, analysis, coding, and question answering.

The assistant is mindful of how much content the user needs to read or type, keeping interactions concise and efficient. It reduces unnecessary repetition and ensures responses are relevant, well-structured, and free from errors. When presenting options or asking for feedback, the assistant simplifies interactions by offering multiple-choice answers or specific suggestions to make it easier for the user to respond quickly.

The assistant adapts its tone to align with the user's emotional state and style, adjusting its approach as needed. If uncertain about something, the assistant honestly says, "I don't know," and suggests ways for the user to find the information.

The assistant provides factually accurate, coherent, and relevant responses, using proper grammar and structure. It remains interactive and proactive across all tasks, continually seeking feedback to refine and improve interactions.

The user's initial question isQuestion: The article looks good but has some repeated sections. Can you revise it to remove duplicate sentences and make the benefits of S3 Care clearer? Also, ensure it stays under 500 words.Now you need to answer the user's most recent question. Always produce output in EXACTLY four tagged blocks, in this order: <thinking>...</thinking><payoff>...</payoff><analyze>...</analyze><response>...</response>. Do not include anything outside these tags. Do not use markdown, code fences, or extra commentary.Inside <thinking>...</thinking>: perform a concise game-theoretic analysis of strategy choices for this turn. **'Repossession': A Horror Film That Mirrors *Get Out* and *Parasite* with Social Critique**

In the chilling world of 'Repossession,' director Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard have crafted a horror film that not only delivers spine-chilling thrills but also serves as a powerful social critique. Set in a near-future where class tensions and materialism run rampant, the film is a haunting exploration of the dark underbelly of society.

**Social Critique Angle:**
'Repossession' mirrors the themes of *Get Out* and *Parasite* by highlighting the deep-seated class divisions and the corrupting influence of materialism. The protagonist, a young woman from a lower socioeconomic background, finds herself trapped in a nightmare where her very identity is at stake. As she navigates the treacherous landscape of wealth and power, she uncovers a sinister plot that threatens to tear her world apart.

The film’s narrative is a masterclass in social commentary. It exposes the harsh realities of a society where the rich are willing to do anything to maintain their status, even if it means exploiting the vulnerable. The protagonist’s journey is a stark reminder of the importance of empathy and the dangers of blind consumerism. Through her experiences, the film encourages viewers to question the values that drive our society and the consequences of our actions.

**Festival Buzz and Director/Producer Credits:**
'Repossession' has already generated significant buzz at film festivals, with critics praising its innovative direction and compelling storyline. Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard bring a fresh perspective to the horror genre, blending psychological horror with social commentary. Their previous works, including *The Other Side* and *The Silent Witness*, have already garnered critical acclaim, setting the stage for this ambitious new project.

**Credibility:**
The film’s creators are no strangers to the horror genre. Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard have a proven track record of producing thought-provoking and visually stunning content. Their collaboration with Gravitas Ventures, a respected distributor known for its commitment to quality and innovation, adds an extra layer of credibility to the project.

**Release Details:**
'Repossession' is set to release in December 2021, with distribution handled by Gravitas Ventures. The film promises to be a must-see for horror fans and those interested in social commentary. With its powerful narrative and talented cast, 'Repossession' is poised to become a standout entry in the horror genre.

gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.

Sure, here’s a concise article on competitive research for validating a niche market:

### Competitive Research for Validating a Niche Market

In today's competitive landscape, validating a niche market requires a thorough understanding of both the demand and supply dynamics. By conducting competitive research, you can identify gaps and opportunities within a niche, helping you refine your product or service to better meet the needs of your target audience.

#### Demand Analysis

To understand the demand for your niche, start by conducting market research. This includes analyzing industry trends, customer preferences, and competitor offerings. Tools like Google Trends, social media analytics, and surveys can provide valuable insights into what consumers are looking for in your niche. For example, if you're targeting eco-friendly products, you might find that there's a growing demand for sustainable packaging solutions.

#### Supply Analysis

Next, assess the supply side of your niche. Identify key players in the market and analyze their strengths and weaknesses. Look at their product offerings, pricing strategies, and market share. Tools like SWOT analysis (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) can help you understand the competitive landscape. For instance, if you're in the niche of high-end fitness equipment, you might find that established brands dominate the market but offer limited customization options.

#### Finding a Niche Within a Niche

Once you have a clear understanding of the demand and supply dynamics, you can start to identify a specific niche within your niche. This involves finding a unique selling proposition (USP) that sets your product or service apart from the competition. For example, if you're in the eco-friendly market, you might focus on creating customizable, biodegradable products that are also stylish and functional.

#### Steps to Validate Your Niche

1. **Conduct Market Research**: Use tools like Google Trends, social media analytics, and surveys to gather data on consumer preferences and market trends.
2. **SWOT Analysis**: Evaluate your competitors and identify areas where you can differentiate yourself.
3. **Pilot Testing**: Launch a small-scale pilot to test your product or service with a target audience. Gather feedback and make adjustments as needed.
4. **Monitor Competitors**: Keep an eye on your competitors and their strategies. This will help you stay ahead and adapt to changing market conditions.

By following these steps, you can validate your niche market and develop a product or service that meets the specific needs of your target audience. Remember, the key is to be proactive and continuously adapt to the evolving market landscape.

---

This article should help you get started with your competitive research and validate your niche market effectively.
</response>
gts:
Photo by Canva Studio from Pexels

Digital enterprises or online businesses are not bound by geography or stringent local regulations.

This makes it easier to start a business but it doesn’t make running the business any easier. Competition is fierce in almost every niche. Whatever your niche is, you should validate it by researching your competition. Let us explain how you should go about this and also why.

Step 1: Demand and Supply

The essence of most businesses can be boiled down to one reality, demand and supply.

If there is enough demand then you can cater to the supply. If there isn’t enough demand, then catering to supply doesn’t make any sense.

If there is only one diner in a locality, then it is likely to do well. If there are too many diners and not many people to fill up all those places, then most of those enterprises will run out of business.

Likewise, a digital enterprise or any online niche must have enough demand for there to be space to exist. While firms or endeavours can always coexist, the pie gets smaller and there is just less in it for everyone. The hard reality is that if there are enough players in a niche already and some of them have already amassed a massive market share, then penetrating their share or usurping a chunk of it will be a herculean task.

Study your competition to find out how large a market is and if some of your competitors are already catering to the needs of the audience. If you intend to do the same thing in the same niche, then there is little or no possibility for your enterprise to find a foothold, let aside being a roaring success.

Step 2: Niche within a Niche!

It is unlikely that the niche you have planned to target will be completely void of competition. There may be stiff or less competition. If there are players already with humongous market shares and dedicated customers or audiences, then you need to find a niche within a niche. You cannot cater to the same exact niche that your competition is committed to.

For instance, if you are planning to target the niche of food, cuisine or anything culinary, then you can find some subset that the existing players have not touched upon yet. If that is not possible, then you must figure out what you are best at and use that authority to create a niche within a niche.

It is all about the value you can offer to your audience and how you help, change or enrich their lives.

Here’s a simple and straightforward article about 3D printers:

### What Are 3D Printers?

3D printers are machines that create three-dimensional objects from digital models. They use various materials like plastic, metal, and even food to build objects layer by layer. This technology has revolutionized manufacturing and is now used in many industries.

### How Do 3D Printers Work?

1. **Printing Process**: The printer starts by creating a digital model of the object you want to print. This model is then broken down into thin layers. The printer then lays down these layers one by one, using a material like plastic or metal.
2. **Materials**: 3D printers can use different types of materials. Some use plastic filament, which is fed through the printer and melted to create layers. Others use powdered materials that are fused together.
3. **Build Volume**: The size of the object you can print depends on the build volume of the printer. This is the maximum size of the object that can be printed in a single session.

### Common Uses of 3D Printers

1. **Healthcare**: 3D printers are used to create custom medical devices and implants. For example, doctors can print prosthetic limbs that fit perfectly to a patient’s body. They can also print models of organs to help surgeons plan surgeries.
2. **Education**: Schools and universities use 3D printers to create models of complex structures and biological systems. This helps students visualize and understand concepts that are difficult to grasp with traditional teaching methods.
3. **Aerospace**: Aerospace companies use 3D printers to create prototypes and small parts for aircraft. This reduces the time and cost of manufacturing these parts.
4. **Prototyping**: Engineers and designers use 3D printers to create prototypes of new products. This allows them to test and refine designs before moving to full-scale production.
5. **Art and Design**: Artists and designers use 3D printers to create sculptures, jewelry, and other artistic pieces. They can also print functional objects like furniture and household items.

### Conclusion

3D printers are versatile machines that can be used in a wide range of industries. They offer a cost-effective and efficient way to create complex objects layer by layer. Whether you need a custom medical device, a school model, or a unique piece of art, 3D printers can help bring your ideas to life.
</response>

Sure, here’s a draft of a short article about blockchain and cryptocurrencies in India, focusing on the examples of land record management and welfare distribution:

---

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Breaking Down Myths and Enhancing Transparency**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors in India, particularly in public services such as land record management and welfare distribution. While there are concerns that blockchain is only used by criminals, it is crucial to debunk these myths and highlight its potential to enhance transparency and reduce corruption.

### Land Record Management

Land records are a critical aspect of any country's governance, and ensuring their accuracy and integrity is essential. In India, land records are often prone to fraud and corruption, leading to disputes and inefficiencies. Blockchain technology can provide a secure and transparent solution to this problem.

**How Blockchain Works:**
- **Immutable Ledger:** Each transaction in a blockchain is recorded on an immutable ledger, meaning once a transaction is verified and added to the blockchain, it cannot be altered. This ensures that land records are tamper-proof and cannot be changed without detection.
- **Smart Contracts:** Smart contracts are self-executing contracts with the terms of the agreement directly written into code. In the context of land records, smart contracts can automate the process of land registration and transfer, reducing the need for intermediaries and minimizing the risk of fraud.
- **Decentralization:** Blockchain is decentralized, meaning there is no single point of failure. This reduces the risk of a single entity controlling the land records and manipulating them for personal gain.

**Benefits:**
- **Reduced Fraud:** With blockchain, each transaction is transparent and verifiable. This reduces the likelihood of fraud and ensures that land records are accurate and up-to-date.
- **Improved Efficiency:** Smart contracts can automate the process of land registration and transfer, reducing the time and cost associated with manual processes.
- **Enhanced Trust:** The transparency and immutability of blockchain provide a level of trust that is difficult to achieve with traditional systems.

### Welfare Distribution

Welfare distribution is another area where blockchain can make a significant impact. In India, welfare schemes are often plagued by corruption and inefficiency, leading to the misallocation of funds and resources. Blockchain can help address these issues by ensuring that funds are distributed transparently and efficiently.

**How Blockchain Works:**
- **Tokenization:** Welfare funds can be tokenized, meaning they are represented as digital assets on the blockchain. This allows for secure and transparent distribution of funds.
- **Smart Contracts:** Smart contracts can be used to automate the distribution of welfare funds, ensuring that they are allocated to the intended beneficiaries. This reduces the risk of corruption and ensures that funds are used for their intended purpose.
- **Identity Verification:** Blockchain can be used to verify the identity of beneficiaries, ensuring that funds are distributed to the correct individuals. This reduces the risk of fraud and ensures that welfare funds are used effectively.

**Benefits:**
- **Reduced Corruption:** With blockchain, each transaction is transparent and verifiable. This reduces the likelihood of corruption and ensures that welfare funds are used for their intended purpose.
- **Improved Efficiency:** Smart contracts can automate the distribution of welfare funds, reducing the time and cost associated with manual processes.
- **Enhanced Trust:** The transparency and immutability of blockchain provide a level of trust that is difficult to achieve with traditional systems.

### Conclusion

Blockchain technology has the potential to transform public services in India, particularly in land record management and welfare distribution. By providing a secure, transparent, and efficient solution, blockchain can help reduce fraud and corruption, and enhance the overall effectiveness of public services. Policymakers should consider implementing blockchain solutions to address these issues and improve the lives of citizens.

---

This article provides a clear and concise overview of how blockchain can be used to improve transparency and reduce corruption in public services. It focuses on the specific examples of land record management and welfare distribution, which are likely to be of interest to policymakers.
</response>
gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

### Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra: Key Features and Specifications

The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra is a flagship smartphone that boasts a range of impressive features, particularly in the camera department. Here are the main highlights:

#### Display
The S22 Ultra features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with a resolution of 3200 x 1440 pixels and a refresh rate of 120Hz. The screen has a 1200 nits peak brightness and supports HDR10+ for vibrant colors and deep blacks.

#### Camera System
The camera system is a standout feature of the S22 Ultra. The Ultra model is equipped with a 108MP improved HM3 sensor, which offers excellent low-light performance and detailed photos. The front-facing camera is a 40-50MP punch-hole design, providing high-quality selfies and video calls.

#### Optical Zoom
The S22 Ultra includes a telephoto lens with 3x optical zoom and 10x Space Zoom capabilities. This allows for clear and sharp photos even when capturing distant subjects. The telephoto lens also benefits from Samsung's advanced image processing technology, ensuring that even the most intricate details are captured beautifully.

#### Charging
The S22 Ultra supports 45W fast charging, which can quickly replenish the battery. Additionally, it includes a 25W wireless charger and 15W reverse wireless charging, making it convenient to charge other devices while on the go.

#### Other Features
- **Battery**: The S22 Ultra comes with a 5000mAh battery, providing ample power for a full day of use.
- **Processor**: It features the latest Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 or Samsung Exynos 2200 processor, depending on the region.
- **Storage**: Available in 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB options.
- **Software**: Runs on Android 12 with Samsung's One UI 4.1.

#### Summary
The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra is a powerful device with exceptional camera capabilities and fast charging. The 108MP improved HM3 sensor and 45W fast charging are key differentiators that make it a top choice for photography enthusiasts and power users alike.

If you have any further questions or need more details, feel free to ask!
</response>

Sure, here’s an updated draft of your article on caring for loc styles:

---

**How to Care for Locs: A Comprehensive Guide**

Caring for locs, whether you have dreadlocks or sister locs, requires a thoughtful and consistent approach to maintenance. This guide will cover essential maintenance tips, product recommendations, and a routine care schedule to help you achieve and maintain healthy locs.

### Maintenance Tips

1. **Regular Brushing**: Use a wide-toothed comb to gently brush your locs every other day. This helps to remove tangles and distribute natural oils evenly throughout your hair.
2. **Co-Washing**: Instead of shampooing, co-washing is a gentler option that can help preserve the natural oils in your hair. Apply a moisturizing conditioner to your locs and gently massage it in. Rinse thoroughly with cool water to close the cuticles.
3. **Deep Conditioning**: Deep condition your locs every 2-3 weeks using a hydrating mask. This will help to nourish and strengthen your hair, preventing breakage and promoting healthy growth.
4. **Avoid Heat Styling**: Heat styling can damage locs, so it’s best to avoid blow drying, straightening, or curling irons. If you must use heat, use a heat protectant spray and keep the temperature low.
5. **Regular Trimming**: Trim your locs every 6-8 weeks to remove any split ends. This will help to maintain the health and appearance of your locs.

### Product Recommendations

When it comes to products, it’s important to choose sulfate-free and creamy shampoos to avoid stripping your hair of its natural oils. Here are some specific product recommendations:

- **Shampoo**: **Selsun Blue Sensitive Shampoo** - This sulfate-free shampoo is gentle on your scalp and hair, making it ideal for loc maintenance.
- **Conditioner**: **Herbivore Botanicals Botanicals Botanicals Hydrating Conditioner** - This creamy conditioner is rich in nourishing ingredients like jojoba oil and shea butter, which help to moisturize and strengthen your locs.
- **Mask**: **Moroccanoil Hydrating Hair Mask** - This deep conditioning mask is perfect for nourishing your locs and promoting healthy growth. It contains shea butter and jojoba oil to hydrate and protect your hair.
- **Heat Protectant**: **Kérastase Discipline Fluidissime Heat & Cool Spray** - This heat protectant spray is designed to protect your locs from heat styling tools. It helps to prevent damage and adds a touch of shine.

### Routine Care Schedule

Here’s a simple routine to follow for optimal loc care:

1. **Morning**: Co-wash your locs with a sulfate-free shampoo and conditioner. Rinse thoroughly with cool water.
2. **Afternoon**: Deep condition your locs with a hydrating mask. Leave it on for 15-20 minutes and rinse thoroughly.
3. **Evening**: Trim any split ends with a clean, sharp pair of scissors. This will help to maintain the health and appearance of your locs.

### Conclusion

At **Locs of Glory Spa and Salon**, we specialize in providing top-notch loc care services. Our expert stylists can help you achieve and maintain healthy locs through personalized treatments and advice. Whether you’re looking to deepen your locs or maintain their natural beauty, we have the expertise to help.

---

### ANBI Solutions: A Leading Player in the Plumbing and MEP Industry

ANBI Solutions is a prominent player in the plumbing and mechanical, electrical, and plumbing (MEP) products supply sector, headquartered in Dubai. The company has established itself as a trusted supplier of high-quality products and services to a wide range of clients across the Middle East and beyond. With a strong focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, ANBI Solutions has become a go-to partner for businesses in the construction and infrastructure sectors.

#### Strengths in the Industry

1. **Diverse Product Range**: ANBI Solutions offers a comprehensive range of products from major international brands, ensuring that customers have access to the latest and most reliable materials. The company’s inventory includes a wide array of pipes, fittings, valves, and other MEP components, catering to various project requirements.

2. **Expertise in Supply Chain Management**: The company has built a robust supply chain network that allows for efficient and timely delivery of products. Their logistics team works closely with suppliers to ensure that orders are processed quickly and accurately, reducing lead times and minimizing disruptions.

3. **Customized Solutions**: Recognizing the unique needs of each client, ANBI Solutions provides customized solutions that meet specific project requirements. Whether it’s a small residential project or a large-scale commercial building, the company offers tailored packages that optimize cost-effectiveness and performance.

4. **Quality Assurance**: ANBI Solutions places a high emphasis on quality control throughout the supply chain. Each product undergoes rigorous testing and inspection to ensure compliance with industry standards and customer expectations. This commitment to quality has earned the company a reputation for delivering top-notch products that meet or exceed client requirements.

5. **Customer Support**: The company’s customer service team is available 24/7 to assist with any queries or concerns. Whether it’s technical advice, product recommendations, or order tracking, ANBI Solutions ensures that clients receive prompt and professional support.

6. **Sustainability Focus**: Recognizing the importance of sustainability in the construction industry, ANBI Solutions has integrated eco-friendly materials and practices into its supply chain. The company offers a range of sustainable products that reduce environmental impact while maintaining high standards of performance and durability.

#### Conclusion

ANBI Solutions stands out in the plumbing and MEP industry due to its strong focus on quality, customer service, and innovation. By partnering with the company, clients can expect reliable products, efficient supply chain management, and customized solutions that meet their specific needs. Whether you are a local contractor or a multinational corporation, ANBI Solutions is committed to delivering excellence in every project.

If you have any specific questions or need more detailed information, feel free to reach out to ANBI Solutions. They are always ready to assist and provide the support you need.
</response>
