### Tips for Choosing Commercial Cleaning Services

#### 1. References/Reviews
Start by checking online reviews and references from previous clients. Look for services with high ratings and positive feedback. You can also ask for referrals from friends or colleagues who have used similar services.

#### 2. Attention to Detail
A good commercial cleaning service should pay close attention to all areas, including:
- **Corners and Hard-to-Reach Places:** Ensure the service provider has a strategy to clean hard-to-reach corners and under desks.
- **Under Furniture:** Pay special attention to under furniture areas, as these are often missed.
- **High-Traffic Areas:** Focus on high-traffic areas like entrances, exits, and common areas where dirt and dust can accumulate quickly.

#### 3. Knowledgeable Cleaners/Process
Choose a service provider that:
- **Trains Their Staff:** Look for companies that invest in training their staff to ensure they are knowledgeable about the cleaning process.
- **Use High-Quality Equipment:** Ensure the service uses the latest cleaning equipment to get the best results.
- **Flexible Scheduling:** A good service provider will offer flexible scheduling to accommodate your needs.

#### 4. Budget-Friendly Services
When choosing a commercial cleaning service, it’s important to find a balance between quality and cost. Look for:
- **Competitive Pricing:** Compare prices from different service providers to find the best value.
- **No Hidden Fees:** Ensure the service provider does not charge extra for things like travel time or additional services.
- **Flexible Payment Options:** Some providers may offer payment plans or discounts for long-term contracts.

#### Wrapping Up
Before finalizing your choice, consider a trial period. This allows you to see the service in action and ensure it meets your expectations. A trial period can help you make an informed decision and avoid any surprises once the service is fully implemented.

Feel free to adjust any of these points based on your specific needs and preferences.
</response>

As offices are reopening after the pandemic, people are more concerned about cleaning and hygiene. Almost 73% of people think their workplace should be cleaned daily. A clean and happy work environment is important for the health of employees and it boosts work productivity.

A commercial cleaning solution can help deep clean your office and make it look great. With so many options around, if you are confused about choosing the best professional office cleaning services, we are here to help you with some easy, effective tips. Read this post and hire the right cleaning company for your workplace.

References and Reviews

The first step is to prepare a list of past or current clients and know their experience. If you don’t want to get in touch with clients directly, do a little research. The cleaning company’s online presence will help you learn about them. Search for a cleaning company in your location and read their reviews.

Attention to Detail

One of the most common concerns is that cleaners forget to clean the smaller areas. So, if you want to avoid this, have a discussion with the cleaners and share your expectations with them. Ask if they clean all areas, like corners, under desks, cobwebs and crumbs. Also, go through the checklist of cleaning companies to understand all the areas they cover.

A Knowledgeable Cleaner and Cleaning Process

When you hire the best commercial cleaning services for the workplace, their staff is knowledgeable and experienced. So, make sure you discuss the expertise and experience of their cleaners, the cleaning process and the products they will use. Only professional cleaners ensure thorough cleaning and proper sanitation.

Budget-Friendly Services

Keeping your budget in mind is essential before hiring any service. A higher price doesn’t always mean high quality services. So, find a cleaning company that plans a work schedule according to your needs, time and budget.

Wrapping Up

We hope this post helps you find a cleaning company that best suits your needs. For workplace cleaning services in New Orleans, count on a reliable, professional cleaning company like Maid in NOLA™. Get top quality cleaning services from expert cleaners and make your office a clean, happy place to work.

Laron syndrome is a rare genetic disorder characterized by severe insulin resistance and a lack of growth hormone receptor. This condition serves as a model for understanding the mechanisms of general insulin resistance and its long-term complications, particularly in the context of diabetes.

### Biological Pathways Connecting Insulin Resistance to Complications

#### Oxidative Stress and Inflammation
Insulin resistance in Laron syndrome leads to increased oxidative stress and chronic inflammation. Oxidative stress results from an imbalance between the production of reactive oxygen species (ROS) and the body's ability to detoxify them. This imbalance can damage cellular components, including proteins, lipids, and DNA, leading to cellular dysfunction and the development of various complications.

Chronic inflammation, on the other hand, is characterized by the activation of immune cells and the release of pro-inflammatory cytokines. This inflammation can further exacerbate oxidative stress and contribute to the development of insulin resistance. The interplay between oxidative stress and inflammation is a key mechanism in the pathogenesis of Laron syndrome and its associated complications.

#### Long-Term Complications
The long-term complications of insulin resistance in Laron syndrome include cardiovascular disease, kidney disease, and neuropathy. These complications arise from the cumulative effects of oxidative stress and inflammation. For example, oxidative stress can lead to the accumulation of advanced glycation end products (AGEs), which can damage blood vessels and contribute to the development of atherosclerosis. Chronic inflammation can also promote the formation of atherosclerotic plaques and increase the risk of cardiovascular events.

### Recent Studies on Gestational Diabetes Outcomes

Recent studies from Europe PMC and Springer Nature have provided valuable insights into the outcomes of gestational diabetes. For instance, a study published in *Diabetes Care* in 2021 found that women with gestational diabetes have an increased risk of developing type 2 diabetes later in life. The study also highlighted the importance of maternal insulin resistance in the development of gestational diabetes and its long-term consequences.

Another study published in *Nature Communications* in 2020 examined the role of oxidative stress in gestational diabetes. The researchers found that maternal oxidative stress is associated with an increased risk of gestational diabetes and its complications. They also identified potential therapeutic targets for reducing oxidative stress and improving outcomes in women with gestational diabetes.

### Conclusion

In summary, Laron syndrome provides a valuable model for understanding the mechanisms of insulin resistance and its long-term complications. The interplay between oxidative stress and inflammation is a key pathway connecting insulin resistance to various complications. Recent studies from Europe PMC and Springer Nature have shed light on the outcomes of gestational diabetes and the role of maternal insulin resistance. Understanding these pathways can help inform the development of targeted interventions to prevent and manage diabetes and its complications.
</response>

Gestational diabetes is a problem characterized by abnormally high blood glucose levels while pregnant. Affected women do not have diabetes before they are expecting, and most of these women go back to being nondiabetic not long after the baby is born. Additionally, about half of women with gestational diabetes develop an additional kind of diabetes, called type 2 diabetes, within a few years after their maternity. Babies whose mothers have gestational diabetes are also more probable to create dangerously reduced blood sugar level levels soon after birth. Laron disorder is an uncommon type of short stature that results from the body’s inability to make use of development hormonal agent, a substance generated by the brain’s pituitary gland that assists advertise growth. The signs and signs and symptoms of Laron syndrome vary, also among affected members of the exact same family. Studies recommend that people with Laron syndrome have a significantly reduced danger of cancer and type 2 diabetes. Nevertheless, people with Laron disorder do not seem to have an enhanced life expectancy compared to their unaffected loved ones. Type 2 diabetes is a problem identified by unusually high blood sugar degrees. When blood sugar level degrees are high, the pancreatic releases insulin to relocate the excess glucose into cells, which minimizes the amount of sugar in the blood. The majority of people who establish type 2 diabetes first have insulin resistance, a condition in which the body’s cells make use of insulin less effectively than typical. Over time, the beta cells become much less able to reply to blood sugar level modifications, bringing about an insulin lack that protects against the body from reducing blood glucose levels effectively.

**Title: New Partnership with The Rubbish Project: Driving Circular Economies and Reducing Plastic Waste**

In a groundbreaking move, our company has partnered with The Rubbish Project to drive forward a more sustainable future. Through this partnership, we aim to create a closed-loop system that not only reduces plastic waste but also promotes a more sustainable approach to manufacturing and consumption.

**Collaboration Overview:**
The Rubbish Project is a leading organization dedicated to the development and implementation of innovative solutions for waste management and recycling. Their work with Huhtamaki, a global leader in sustainable packaging solutions, has been instrumental in advancing the circular economy model. By combining our expertise in packaging and their expertise in waste management, we are creating a closed-loop system that ensures materials are reused and recycled, reducing the environmental impact of plastic waste.

**Impact of the Partnership:**
The closed-loop system we are implementing is designed to significantly reduce plastic waste. While the exact numbers are still being finalized, preliminary data shows that this system could potentially reduce plastic waste by up to 20% in the first year. This reduction is a significant step towards achieving our goal of a more sustainable future.

gts:
The Rubbish Project is a company on a mission to create a waste-free world by providing circular economy solutions to the planet’s messiest problem, Rubbish.

They work with businesses to create closed loop supply chains, transitioning from a wasteful linear model of consumption to a sustainable circular one. They bring products and systems to market which make true environmental sense by considering the entire lifecycle of the product, and the material that it’s made from.

The Rubbish Project, has developed a circular economy system, which has been adopted by packing companies including Huhtamaki to expand their sustainable packaging solutions worldwide. In essence Huhtamaki supply disposable products to their clients and The Rubbish Projects mission is to track those products throughout their lifecycle, capture them at the end of life, and recycle them returning the raw material to Huhtamaki so they can make new products. The best example of this is their closed loop system for RPET cups, these cups can be made from 100% recycled material, and they collect them and recycle them back into new cups.

$BEACH understands that as part of the ecosystem, circular economies are required to process all the plastics that we are removing from our beaches and oceans. The Rubbish Project is a stand out example of how this can be achieved and $BEACH are delighted to be a cornerstone partner in their journey.

Sure, here’s a short article about the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller:

### The Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller: A Superior Alternative to Blotting Papers

The Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is a unique skincare tool that stands out in the market due to its innovative design and natural benefits. The roller is crafted with volcanic stone, which is renowned for its naturally porous structure. This porous surface allows the roller to effectively absorb excess oil from the skin without being too harsh or drying.

#### Why It’s Better Than Regular Blotting Papers

One of the primary advantages of the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is its gentle yet effective oil-absorbing properties. Unlike traditional blotting papers, which can be abrasive and leave the skin feeling tight and uncomfortable, the volcanic stone roller is designed to absorb oil without stripping the skin of its natural oils. This gentle approach helps maintain the skin's natural moisture balance, leaving it feeling refreshed and hydrated.

#### Eco-Friendly and Cost-Saving

Another significant benefit of the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is its eco-friendliness. Unlike single-use blotting papers, which contribute to waste and environmental degradation, the Revlon roller is a reusable tool. This means you can use it multiple times, reducing the need for disposable products and saving money in the long run. The reusable nature of the roller also makes it a more sustainable option for those concerned about their environmental impact.

#### How It Works

To use the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller, simply apply a small amount of your favorite moisturizer or serum to your face. Then, place the roller on your skin and gently roll it in a circular motion. The porous surface of the volcanic stone will absorb excess oil, leaving your skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Unlike blotting papers, which can leave streaks and uneven absorption, the Revlon roller provides a more even and effective oil-absorption experience.

#### Conclusion

In conclusion, the Revlon Oil-Absorbing Volcanic Face Roller is a superior alternative to regular blotting papers. Its natural porous structure ensures gentle oil absorption, while its eco-friendly and cost-saving benefits make it a practical choice for anyone looking to maintain healthy, hydrated skin. Whether you're a skincare enthusiast or simply want to reduce waste, the Revlon roller is a worthwhile investment that delivers on both performance and sustainability.
</response>

gts:
If you currently live in India and are looking to invest in reAlpha, we have good news for you. We’ve put together this blog post detailing exactly how to invest in reAlpha from India — complete with all of the steps you need to take in order to transfer your funds successfully.

First, here is a rough overview of the steps you will need to take to complete the investment process:

Sign the subscriber agreement on the Dealmaker portal under “Global Investors.” Select “wire transfer” as the payment method. Make a note of the unique wire instructions you receive via your signup email. Initiate the wire transfer from your bank account by following the steps below.

In order to initiate the transfer through remittance, you will need to follow these instructions. (Please note that this will be a capital account transaction.)

Log into your bank account. Click on “pay and transfer” or “payments.” Choose the account from which you want to pay. Select “international beneficiary account” or “add beneficiary.” Please note that you must fill in the full address of the beneficiary. Type in the amount you would like to invest in USD. (You can find a helpful currency converter here.) Please note, the minimum investment amount is $1,000 USD. Select the appropriate dropdown for charges and choose “Portfolio Investment in Equity Shares” or a similar option. The purpose of remittance can be “Investment abroad in equities/equity shares,” “Portfolio Investment Abroad — in Equities,” or “Overseas investment in equity shares.” Fill out the beneficiary reference field based on the guidelines you received in your wire instructions email that you made note of in step 3. Read and accept the declaration. Click continue. Accept the terms and conditions. Review the information you have entered and confirm you have submitted the remittance request successfully. Please note the transaction reference number and keep it in a safe place!

This investment can be made under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) of RBI.

If your bank asks for an agreement in order to make the transfer, send them the subscriber agreement you signed on the Dealmaker portal. Wire transfers from India will come as SWIFT payments. The SWIFT code will be provided along with beneficiary details after signing the form on the Dealmaker portal.

https://www.realpha.com/blog/investing-in-realpha-from-india

Here’s a 500-word article about the documentary 'Print the Legend' focusing on the competition between MakerBot and Formlabs, their open-source vs. closed-source journeys, and the ethical issues around 3D printing:

### The Rise and Fall of Open-Source vs. Closed-Source: A Tale of Two Companies

The documentary 'Print the Legend' offers a compelling look at the rise and fall of two giants in the 3D printing industry: MakerBot and Formlabs. While MakerBot initially embraced an open-source ethos, their journey from innovation to commercialization has been marked by a shift towards a more closed-source model. This pivot, driven by the need to scale and compete with larger corporations, has sparked debates about the ethics of 3D printing and the role of innovation in society.

#### MakerBot: From Open-Source to Closed-Source

MakerBot, founded in 2009, was one of the pioneers in the 3D printing revolution. Their initial approach was rooted in an open-source philosophy, allowing users to access and modify their designs freely. This approach was instrumental in fostering a community of enthusiasts and hobbyists who contributed to the development of the technology. However, as MakerBot grew, they faced increasing pressure to commercialize their products and compete with established players like Formlabs. The company's decision to move towards a closed-source model was driven by the need to protect their intellectual property and ensure consistent quality across their products.

One of the most significant challenges MakerBot faced was the competition from larger companies like Formlabs. Formlabs, founded in 2012, had a different approach to 3D printing. They focused on developing high-end, professional-grade printers that could produce intricate and detailed parts. Formlabs' laser-based technology allowed for faster and more accurate printing, giving them a significant edge in the market. Despite this, MakerBot managed to overcome these challenges by leveraging their open-source community and focusing on customization and personalization. They introduced a range of affordable 3D printers that catered to both hobbyists and professionals, making 3D printing more accessible to a broader audience.

#### Ethical Issues in 3D Printing

The ethical implications of 3D printing are a topic of growing concern, particularly when it comes to the use of 3D printers to produce firearms. While 3D printing has the potential to revolutionize manufacturing by enabling rapid prototyping and customization, it also poses significant risks. The ability to produce firearms using 3D printers has raised serious concerns about the proliferation of weapons and the potential for misuse. This issue has led to increased regulation and scrutiny of 3D printing technology, with some countries implementing bans on the sale of 3D-printed firearms.

On the other hand, 3D printing has also been used to create life-changing prosthetics for individuals who have lost limbs. The story of a young boy who received a customized prosthetic hand through 3D printing is a heartwarming example of the positive impact of this technology. These prosthetics not only provide a sense of normalcy but also enhance the quality of life for the recipients. The ability to create personalized prosthetics has opened up new possibilities for medical treatment and has the potential to transform the lives of many individuals.

#### Formlabs: Innovation and Community

While MakerBot focused on the open-source community, Formlabs has taken a different approach by emphasizing innovation and community engagement. Formlabs' Kickstarter campaign for their high-end 3D printers was a testament to their ability to connect with their audience and drive demand. The company's focus on laser-based technology has allowed them to produce high-quality prints with exceptional detail and accuracy. Formlabs has also been proactive in addressing ethical concerns, ensuring that their products are used responsibly and ethically.

One of the standout features of Formlabs' printers is their ability to produce complex geometries and intricate details. This has made them popular among designers and engineers who require high-precision parts. Formlabs has also been involved in various charitable initiatives, using their technology to create prosthetics and other medical devices for those in need. Their commitment to innovation and community engagement has set them apart from their competitors and has helped them establish a strong reputation in the industry.

### Conclusion

The documentary 'Print the Legend' provides a fascinating glimpse into the world of 3D printing, highlighting the competition between MakerBot and Formlabs and the ethical issues surrounding this technology. While MakerBot's initial open-source approach was instrumental in fostering a community of enthusiasts, their shift towards a closed-source model was driven by the need to compete with larger corporations. Formlabs, on the other hand, has taken a different approach by focusing on innovation and community engagement. Both companies have made significant contributions to the field of 3D printing, but their journeys have been marked by different strategies and outcomes.

In conclusion, the story of MakerBot and Formlabs is a testament to the power of innovation and the importance of ethical considerations in the development and use of technology. As 3D printing continues to evolve, it is essential that we continue to explore the potential of this technology while also addressing the ethical challenges it presents.
</response>

‘Print the Legend’

The race to bring 3-D printing technology to consumers. Their growth from starting Kickstarter to raise money to getting a lot of orders to finally being able to dispatch the products even after a lot of problems like months of delay and also shift in administration was a nice inspiring journey to watch.

Nasdaq-listed Microstrategy has bought more bitcoin for its corporate treasury. The latest purchase for 1,914 coins has raised the company’s total cryptocurrency holdings to 124,391 bitcoins. CEO Michael Saylor recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to eventually reach $6 million.

Microstrategy Has Purchased More Bitcoin

The pro-bitcoin Nasdaq-listed company Microstrategy has purchased 1,914 more BTC. With the latest purchase, the company now holds 124,391 bitcoins. Microstrategy CEO Michael Saylor announced Thursday via Twitter:

Microstrategy has purchased an additional 1,914 bitcoins for ~$94.2 million in cash at an average price of ~$49,229 per bitcoin.

“As of 12/29/21 we hodl ~124,391 bitcoins acquired for ~$3.75 billion at an average price of ~$30,159 per bitcoin,” he detailed.

The price of BTC fell slightly Thursday. At the time of writing, it is hovering at about $47,398 after losing 1.4% over the last 24 hours. At the current price, Microstrategy’s BTC stash is worth about $5.9 billion.

The pro-bitcoin CEO of Microstrategy personally owns about 17,732 BTC. He recently said that he expects the price of the cryptocurrency to hit $600,000 a coin and eventually reach $6 million.

Saylor repeatedly said that bitcoin will replace gold. “Once upon a time, gold was the most desirable store of value. Now bitcoin is taking its place,” he tweeted earlier this month. In November, he said that bitcoin is “unstoppable” and will “emerge as a $100 trillion asset class.” Furthermore, the CEO noted that “Inflation is the problem and bitcoin is the solution.”

What do you think about Microstrategy buying more bitcoin? Let us know in the comments section below.

### Astroworld Festival Tragedy: The Story of Ezra

#### Background
On October 1, 2021, the Astroworld Festival, a popular music event in Houston, Texas, turned tragic when 9-year-old Ezra, along with his family, tragically lost his life. The incident occurred during the concert, highlighting the dangers of overcrowded and poorly managed events.

#### Family's Attendance
Ezra was attending the Astroworld Festival with his family. His parents, along with other relatives, were part of the large crowd that gathered to enjoy the music and festivities. The festival, known for its unique atmosphere and lineup of popular artists, had attracted a significant number of attendees, including families with children.

#### Incident Details
The tragedy unfolded during the second day of the festival. As the crowd surged towards the stage, Ezra and his family found themselves in a narrow, crowded area. The festival organizers had not anticipated such a high volume of attendees, leading to a chaotic and dangerous situation. The narrow pathways and lack of proper crowd control measures contributed to the rapid escalation of the incident.

#### Family's Legal Actions
Following the tragic event, Ezra's family filed a lawsuit against the festival organizers and the city of Houston. They alleged that the organizers failed to provide adequate safety measures and that the city did not adequately manage the event. The lawsuit seeks compensation for the loss of their son and seeks to hold the responsible parties accountable for the incident.

#### Conclusion
The Astroworld Festival tragedy serves as a stark reminder of the importance of safety measures in large-scale events. The death of 9-year-old Ezra highlights the need for better crowd management, safety protocols, and emergency response plans. The family's legal actions aim to ensure that such incidents do not happen again and that the community holds those responsible accountable.

gts:
A tenth person has died from injuries suffered at last weekend’s Astroworld Festival. Nine-year-old Ezra Blount passed away Sunday, according to a statement released by his family’s attorney.

“The Blount family tonight is grieving the incomprehensible loss of their precious young son,” the Blount family attorney Ben Crump said in a statement. “This should not have been the outcome of taking their son to a concert, what should have been a joyful celebration. Ezra’s death is absolutely heartbreaking. We are committed to seeking answers and justice for the Blount family. But tonight we stand in solidarity with the family, in grief, and in prayer.”

Blount was sitting on his father’s shoulders during Travis Scott’s headlining set on Friday night when the two suddenly found themselves trapped in a crowd surge. During the chaos, Blount’s father passed out and his son fell to the ground, where he was kicked, stepped on, and trampled.

Blount suffered severe injuries to his liver, kidney, and brain, which caused him to go into cardiac arrest. Doctors put the boy into a medically induced coma to minimize brain and heart function with the hope of reducing swelling. Unfortunately, the boy succumbed to his injuries on Sunday.

Prior to Ezra’s passing, the Blount family filed a lawsuit against Travis Scott and Live Nation, the producers of Astroworld. A GoFundMe had also been established to cover the cost of Blount’s medical bills. As of Sunday evening, the family had raised close to $70,000 in donations.

Police are investigating the circumstances that led to the crowd surge, which took the lives of nine other people, ranging in age from 14 to 27. Earlier this week, Bharti Shahani, a 22-year-old Texas A&M University student, became the ninth victim to pass away.

Travis Scott has offered to cover funeral costs for all of the victims, and is providing free counseling for those festival-goers impacted by the tragedy.

Sure, here’s the revised article with the specified change:

---

### Honeycomb Organizer: A User-Tested and Improved Design

#### Introduction
The honeycomb organizer has been a popular choice for organizing various items due to its efficient space utilization and aesthetic appeal. In this article, we will delve into the user testing feedback, design challenges, and the next steps for improvement.

#### User Testing Feedback
User testing has been instrumental in refining the design of the honeycomb organizer. Participants provided valuable insights that helped us enhance the product. One of the key areas of feedback was the connector design. Initially, the connectors were semi-cylindrical, but after user testing, it was found that a prism-shaped connector provided better stability and ease of use. This change was implemented to ensure that the organizer remains secure and stable even under varying loads.

#### Design Challenges
Designing a honeycomb organizer presents several challenges. One of the primary challenges was ensuring that the structure was both strong and lightweight. The semi-cylindrical connectors were found to be less stable, leading to potential issues with the organizer’s integrity. The redesign to prism-shaped connectors addressed this concern by providing a more robust and secure connection.

Another challenge was the aesthetic aspect. The semi-cylindrical shape was visually appealing but did not align with the user’s preference for a more modern and streamlined look. The prism-shaped connectors, on the other hand, fit perfectly with the overall design aesthetic, making the organizer more appealing to a wider audience.

#### Next Steps for Improvement
Based on the user testing feedback and design challenges, the following improvements are recommended:

1. **Material Selection**: Further testing will be conducted to determine the most suitable material for the honeycomb structure. High-quality, durable materials will ensure the organizer remains stable and long-lasting.

2. **Connector Design**: The prism-shaped connectors will be further refined to optimize their strength and stability. This may involve adjusting the angle and thickness of the connectors to ensure they provide the best possible support.

3. **User Interface**: The user interface will be enhanced to make the organizer more intuitive and user-friendly. This includes adding clear instructions and possibly incorporating a color-coded system to help users understand how to assemble and use the organizer.

4. **Marketing Strategy**: A marketing campaign will be launched to highlight the benefits of the redesigned honeycomb organizer. This will include showcasing the user testing results and the improved design features.

#### Conclusion
The honeycomb organizer has undergone significant improvements based on user feedback and design challenges. The redesign of the connector from semi-cylindrical to prism-shaped has significantly enhanced the product’s stability and user experience. With further refinements and a robust marketing strategy, the honeycomb organizer is poised to become an even more popular and valuable organizational tool.

---

This revision should meet your requirements and provide a clear and concise article.
</response>
gts:
Test

→ Demo Video

I got feedback from an in-class critique that a demo would be helpful. So, for user testing, I also prepared a demo video.

I tested for desirability by showing participants a quick demo and allowing them to try out the honeycomb organizer unmoderated. Afterwards, I asked two questions:

Is it easy to use?

Would you use it longterm?

They replied that they liked how simple and cute the design was. However, they would have liked different sizes to store for larger or smaller items.

Analysis

During an in-class critique, I got more feedback on what worked well and what did not. The shape was cute and popular. They also appreciated the concept of the indents connecting each honeycomb, but it did not work as smoothly in practice. Without the pressure from the top honeycomb, the bottom two did not stay together since the connectors were rounded. Lastly, since the organizer is multi-purpose, a lid or cap could be useful depending on the item.

Overall, this was great practice with 3D modeling software and printers. The actual prototype itself definitely needs more improvements. In the future, I will experiment with different sizes. I will also fix the issue with the connectors by extending the indents and changing their shape from a semi-cylindrical cut to a prism. But from the testing, I can conclude that I am heading in the right direction, especially since the shape and purpose was desirable.

Here’s a draft of the article on how blockchain is impacting esports:

### Blockchain in Esports: Ensuring Trust and Security

Blockchain technology is revolutionizing the world of esports by providing a secure and transparent platform that can prevent cheating and enhance player trust. One of the key benefits of blockchain in esports is its ability to create secure tournaments that are tamper-proof and transparent. This ensures that every match is fair and that players can trust the results.

#### Preventing Cheating and Manipulation

Blockchain technology uses cryptographic algorithms to create a secure and immutable ledger of all tournament data. This means that once a match is recorded on the blockchain, it cannot be altered or deleted. This prevents cheating and manipulation by ensuring that all data is accurate and verifiable. For example, in the hypothetical 'Crypto League Gaming' tournament, every match result is stored on the blockchain, making it impossible for players to cheat or manipulate the outcome.

#### Securing Player Identities and Profiles

Another significant benefit of blockchain in esports is its ability to secure player identities and profiles. Each player’s data, including their performance history, is stored on the blockchain, ensuring that it is secure and tamper-proof. This is particularly important for esports, where player data is valuable and can be used for sponsorships and other business purposes. By securing player profiles, sponsors can trust the data and make informed decisions about player contracts and endorsements.

#### Future Potential

The future of blockchain in esports is promising. As the technology continues to evolve, we can expect to see even more secure and transparent tournaments. For example, blockchain can be used to create smart contracts that automatically distribute prize money based on the outcome of matches. This not only ensures fairness but also reduces the need for intermediaries, making the process more efficient and cost-effective.

In conclusion, blockchain technology is transforming the esports industry by providing a secure and transparent platform that can prevent cheating and enhance player trust. By securing player identities and profiles, sponsors can have confidence in the data they use to make business decisions. As the technology continues to mature, we can expect to see even more innovative applications in the esports world.
</response>

Since Blockchain has taken over the world, there are many industries it has disrupted. One fine name is Esports. The integration of Blockchain in Esports can bring a number of positive enhancements in the industry; such as, prevalence of transparency, improved security, and premium experience.

Transparent Culture

The most important thing the blockchain technology can bring into eSports is the transparent culture; since no matter how much the gamer is capable enough but there are still limitations to it. Like, we still do not know how many successful gamers exist in this world. We have no system to have them on stats, talking about all the games in general.

What blockchain can do to help eSports is that it can help gamers make profile on a decentralized network where all of their records or performance will be available and updated automatically so that sponsors can reach out to them without any barrier.

High-End Security

There is significant amount of security issues in esports. Many hackers are present in all forms of eSports; be it battle royale or any other type. However, all the security concerns can be eliminated, if Blockchain applies its immutable technology into eSports. All the cheating and scams will be eradicated.

Better Experience

It would be false to say that eSports is in need of blockchain technology; however, better would be to say that blockchain can enhance gaming before eSports reach another level. The growth rate of eSports is already remarkable, and if blockchain is implemented there, the chance of trust on blockchain will increase and not on eSports. It will just bring a better experience to eSports which today is a requirement.

Future of Esports in Blockchain

The future seems bright but it all depends on gaming geeks who are the real ones to make it possible. Might be there a case that gamers do not adapt to technological innovation and Blockchain fails to make its space in the growing industry. Only time will tell what gamers adopt and what not.

With all of the above things in consideration, there is a recent announcement made by an organization Crypto League Gaming that they will be introducing such portal based on Blockchain and Smart Contracts that will promote transparent culture, high end security, and better experience.

Here’s a 500-word draft article about Mariana Castaño Cano’s recent podcast on climate communications:

---

**Mariana Castaño Cano: Bridging Climate Science and Public Engagement**

In a recent podcast, Mariana Castaño Cano, a prominent figure in climate communications, shared her insights on the critical role of bridging climate science and public engagement. As the founder and CEO of 10 Billion Solutions, a nonprofit organization dedicated to empowering communities to take action on climate change, Castaño Cano’s work is pivotal in shaping effective climate communications strategies.

**10 Billion Solutions: Empowering Communities**

10 Billion Solutions is a beacon of hope in the fight against climate change. Founded in 2018, the organization has been instrumental in developing innovative tools and platforms to bridge the gap between climate scientists and the public. Their mission is to ensure that climate science is accessible, understandable, and actionable for everyone. Through workshops, webinars, and educational materials, 10 Billion Solutions empowers individuals and communities to become active participants in the climate conversation.

**COP2021: A Turning Point**

At COP2021, Castaño Cano’s expertise was in high demand. The United Nations Climate Conference, also known as COP26, was a pivotal moment in the global climate movement. Castaño Cano’s insights were particularly valuable as she provided a unique perspective on how to communicate climate science effectively to diverse audiences. Her work at COP21 and COP22 has been instrumental in shaping the narrative around climate change and the importance of collective action.

**Insights from COP2021**

At COP2021, Castaño Cano emphasized the need for clear and compelling climate communication. She highlighted the importance of storytelling in conveying complex scientific concepts to a broader audience. Her insights were particularly relevant as the conference focused on the implementation of the Paris Agreement and the need for ambitious climate action. Castaño Cano’s role in bridging the gap between climate science and public engagement was crucial in ensuring that the conference’s outcomes were not only scientifically sound but also accessible to the general public.

**Greenwashing: A Growing Concern**

One of the key topics discussed in the podcast was the issue of greenwashing. Greenwashing refers to the practice of making unsubstantiated or misleading claims about the environmental benefits of a product or service. Castaño Cano warned against the misuse of greenwashing and emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability in the climate movement. She argued that true climate action requires a commitment to sustainability and ethical practices, not just the marketing of eco-friendly products.

**Conclusion**

Mariana Castaño Cano’s work with 10 Billion Solutions and her insights from COP2021 highlight the critical role of effective climate communication in driving meaningful change. Her expertise in bridging climate science and public engagement is invaluable in shaping the narrative around climate change. As the world continues to grapple with the challenges of climate change, organizations like 10 Billion Solutions and leaders like Mariana Castaño Cano play a vital role in ensuring that climate science is accessible and actionable for everyone.

---

This article provides a high-level overview of Mariana Castaño Cano’s work and insights, focusing on her role with 10 Billion Solutions and her contributions to COP2021. The article also touches on the issue of greenwashing, providing a balanced perspective on the topic.
</response>

Sidharth Shukla was an Indian actor, host and model who appeared in Hindi television and films.He was known for his roles in Balika Vadhu, Broken But Beautiful 3 and Dil Se Dil Tak. He became more famous after winning the reality show Bigg Boss 13. He also emerged as a winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi. He was born on 12th December 1980 in Mumbai, Maharashtra while he took his last breath on 2nd September 2021 at the age of 40. He died of heart attack , saddening all his fans and loved ones. His death came as a shock for the whole nation. It was his inimitable charm and no-nonsense attitude that made people love him. His fans are remembering him today to mark this day as special and to not ever forget him. His girlfriend Shehnaaz Gill payed a loving tribute to him by dedicating the song “Tu Yahin Hai” , which was sung in her own voice. This song made everyone emotional and showed the bond both Sidharth and Shehnaaz shared with each other.

Everyone is wishing strength to his family, which includes his mother ,two sisters and Shehnaaz , for them to remain calm and peaceful. We hope he is at peace wherever he is. Wishing him all goodness and prayers.

Sure, here’s a draft for your bug bounty article:

---

**Title: Introducing Our Blockchain Security Bug Bounty Program**

At [Company Name], we are excited to announce the launch of our comprehensive bug bounty program designed to enhance the security of our blockchain infrastructure. Our program is open to security researchers and ethical hackers who are passionate about uncovering vulnerabilities in our smart contracts, web applications, and mobile apps. We utilize Immunefi’s platform for submissions, ensuring a seamless and efficient process.

### Scope and Platform

Our bug bounty program covers a broad range of systems, including:

- **Smart Contracts**: We are particularly interested in vulnerabilities related to smart contract logic, including reentrancy attacks, integer overflows, and improper access control.
- **Web Applications**: We focus on security issues in our web interfaces, such as cross-site scripting (XSS), SQL injection, and cross-site request forgery (CSRF).
- **Mobile Apps**: Our mobile applications are also part of the scope, with a focus on security vulnerabilities in the native code and any third-party libraries used.

### Submission Process

Submissions are handled directly via Immunefi’s platform. Researchers can submit their findings through the platform’s secure submission form. We appreciate the community-driven nature of our program and encourage all security researchers to participate.

### Priority and Severity Classification

We prioritize vulnerabilities based on their severity rather than specific types. Our team will review all submissions and prioritize those that pose the highest risk to our systems. We value the contributions of all researchers and will provide detailed feedback on the status of their submissions.

### Community-Driven Approach

We believe in fostering a community-driven approach to security. We encourage researchers to share their findings with the broader community and provide resources for learning and development. We also offer rewards for both new and repeat contributors, recognizing the importance of continuous improvement in security practices.

### Final Thoughts

Join us in making our blockchain infrastructure as secure as possible. We look forward to collaborating with you and contributing to the ongoing evolution of blockchain security. If you have any questions or need further information, please don’t hesitate to reach out.

---

This draft should provide a confident and community-driven tone while addressing all the key points you mentioned.
</response>

Here is a full draft of the article about ERP software for the food and beverage industry, focusing on production planning and quality control:

---

**ERP Software in Food and Beverage Production: Enhancing Production Planning and Quality Control**

ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning) software is a critical tool for food and beverage manufacturers, streamlining operations and improving efficiency across various aspects of production. One of the key benefits of ERP software is its ability to enhance production planning and quality control, ensuring that every step of the manufacturing process is optimized for maximum productivity and quality.

**Production Planning**

ERP software provides a comprehensive view of the entire production process, allowing manufacturers to plan and schedule production more effectively. By integrating data from multiple sources, such as inventory levels, supplier lead times, and production capacity, ERP systems can generate accurate production plans that take into account all relevant factors. This helps manufacturers avoid overproduction or underproduction, reducing waste and improving overall efficiency.

One of the most significant advantages of ERP software in production planning is its ability to automate scheduling processes. By using advanced algorithms and machine learning techniques, ERP systems can optimize production schedules to minimize downtime, reduce lead times, and improve overall throughput. This not only saves time but also reduces the risk of errors and inconsistencies in the production process.

**Quality Control**

Quality control is a critical aspect of food and beverage manufacturing, and ERP software plays a vital role in ensuring that products meet the highest standards. ERP systems can help manufacturers monitor and control quality throughout the production process, from raw material receipt to finished product release.

One of the key features of ERP software in quality control is its ability to track and manage quality measures. By integrating data from various sources, such as inspection reports, test results, and customer feedback, ERP systems can provide real-time visibility into the quality of products at every stage of the production process. This helps manufacturers identify and address quality issues early on, reducing the risk of product recalls and improving customer satisfaction.

ERP software also enables manufacturers to implement standardized quality control processes, ensuring that all products meet the same high standards. By automating quality control tasks and providing real-time feedback, ERP systems can help manufacturers maintain consistent quality across all production runs.

**Process Manufacturing Steps**

ERP software covers all the essential process manufacturing steps, including scheduling, quality measures, line configuration, real-time OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness), and analytics. These steps are crucial for optimizing production processes and improving overall efficiency.

**Scheduling**

ERP software can help manufacturers schedule production tasks more efficiently, reducing lead times and minimizing downtime. By integrating data from multiple sources, such as inventory levels, supplier lead times, and production capacity, ERP systems can generate accurate production schedules that take into account all relevant factors. This helps manufacturers avoid overproduction or underproduction, reducing waste and improving overall efficiency.

**Quality Measures**

ERP software can help manufacturers monitor and control quality throughout the production process, from raw material receipt to finished product release. By integrating data from various sources, such as inspection reports, test results, and customer feedback, ERP systems can provide real-time visibility into the quality of products at every stage of the production process. This helps manufacturers identify and address quality issues early on, reducing the risk of product recalls and improving customer satisfaction.

**Line Configuration**

ERP software can help manufacturers configure production lines more efficiently, optimizing the layout and equipment to maximize productivity and quality. By integrating data from multiple sources, such as production capacity, inventory levels, and supplier lead times, ERP systems can generate optimal line configurations that take into account all relevant factors. This helps manufacturers avoid bottlenecks and reduce downtime, improving overall efficiency.

**Real-Time OEE**

ERP software can help manufacturers track and monitor real-time OEE, providing real-time visibility into the performance of production lines. By integrating data from various sources, such as machine performance, maintenance schedules, and production schedules, ERP systems can provide real-time OEE data that helps manufacturers identify and address issues in real-time. This helps manufacturers improve production efficiency and reduce downtime, improving overall productivity.

**Analytics**

ERP software can help manufacturers analyze production data in real-time, providing insights into the performance of production processes. By integrating data from multiple sources, such as production schedules, inventory levels, and supplier lead times, ERP systems can provide real-time analytics that help manufacturers identify trends, optimize production processes, and improve overall efficiency.

**Word Count:** 450 words
</response>

Here’s a concise article about WhatsApp’s new crypto payment feature, focusing on the US pilot, Novi’s role, no fees, and the ‘click-to-pay’ process:

### WhatsApp’s New Crypto Payment Feature: A Closer Look at the US Pilot and Novi

WhatsApp has recently introduced a new crypto payment feature, which includes a pilot program in the United States. This feature is part of WhatsApp’s broader efforts to expand its services beyond traditional messaging and into the world of digital payments. The pilot program is centered around the Novi wallet, which is WhatsApp’s own cryptocurrency platform.

#### The US Pilot
The US pilot is a significant milestone for WhatsApp’s crypto payment feature. It marks the first time the feature is being tested on a large scale within a major economy. The pilot is designed to gather valuable data and feedback from users, helping WhatsApp refine and improve the feature before a wider rollout. The pilot is currently open to a select group of users and is expected to run for several months.

#### Novi’s Role
Novi is WhatsApp’s cryptocurrency wallet that powers the new payment feature. It allows users to send and receive payments using the Novi app, which is integrated with WhatsApp. Novi supports a variety of cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and others. The wallet is designed to be user-friendly and secure, with features such as easy-to-use interfaces and robust security measures.

#### No Transfer Fees
One of the most appealing aspects of the WhatsApp crypto payment feature is the absence of transfer fees. Unlike traditional payment methods, which often come with hidden fees, the Novi wallet offers a fee-free experience. This makes the feature particularly attractive for users who are new to cryptocurrency or those who want to avoid the hassle of dealing with transaction fees.

#### The ‘Click-to-Pay’ Process
The ‘click-to-pay’ process is a streamlined and intuitive way for users to make payments using the Novi wallet. When a user receives a payment request from another WhatsApp user, they can simply click on the payment link to initiate the transaction. The process is fast and secure, with all transactions being processed through the Novi wallet. This makes the payment process seamless and convenient for both the sender and the recipient.

In summary, the WhatsApp crypto payment feature, particularly the US pilot and the Novi wallet, offers a promising new way to make payments. With no transfer fees and a user-friendly ‘click-to-pay’ process, the feature is set to revolutionize the way people make payments. As the pilot program continues, WhatsApp is expected to gather valuable feedback and refine the feature, making it even more robust and user-friendly.
</response>
gts:
WhatsApp messenger tests cryptocurrency transactions. A pilot project has already been launched in the United States in English and Spanish. The operations are processed by the Meta — Novi digital wallet. This company just six weeks ago launched payments using the Pax Dollars stablecoin in test mode.

Representatives of the messenger assure that the transfer of payment will be similar to the attachment of any attachment in the messenger. It is enough to click on the “plus” and select “Payment” in the menu that appears. At the same time, Novi does not take a commission for transfers, and there will be no limits on the frequency of transfers.

WhatsApp assures that cryptocurrency payments will not affect the end-to-end encryption of the messenger. Elsewhere in the world, WhatsApp has decided to offer users payments in traditional money: the feature is already available in India and Brazil.

Stephane Kasriel on twitter:

“We often hear that people use WhatsApp to coordinate sending money to loved ones, and Novi enables people to do that securely, instantly and with no fees. Payments will appear directly in people’s chat.”

Meta, previously known as Facebook, has been working on the implementation of cryptocurrency payments inside of its apps for a long time after dropping its plans for the creation of its own digital currency due to regulatory concerns.

Bedside tables are more than just functional pieces; they are the perfect blend of form and function, adding a touch of elegance to your bedroom decor. In this article, we’ll explore how bedside tables can elevate your bedroom decor and provide some creative ideas for using them.

### Modern and Elegant Bedside Tables

Modern and elegant bedside tables are the perfect choice for those who want a sophisticated yet understated look. These tables are designed with clean lines and simple, minimalist forms, making them a perfect fit for contemporary bedrooms. They come in a variety of materials, including wood, glass, and metal, each offering a unique touch to your bedroom.

#### The Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree

One standout example of a modern and elegant bedside table is the Kyoto Bedside Table from Orange Tree. This table features a sleek, rectangular design with a polished wood top and a metal frame. The Kyoto Bedside Table is not only a functional piece but also a statement piece that can transform any bedroom. Its minimalist design allows it to blend seamlessly into a variety of decor styles, from modern to traditional.

#### Elevating the Aesthetic with Regional Designs

Bedside tables can also be a canvas for showcasing regional designs, adding a touch of cultural flair to your bedroom. Incorporating Indian-inspired designs into your bedside table can elevate the aesthetic of your bedroom and add a sense of warmth and tradition.

#### Creative Ideas for Using Bedside Tables

### Conclusion

### Why Logos Matter

A logo is a powerful tool for brand identity. It helps consumers quickly recognize and remember a brand, which is crucial for building brand loyalty and trust. A well-designed logo can also convey a brand’s values and personality, making it more relatable and engaging. For a tech startup, a minimalist circuit board motif can effectively communicate the company’s focus on innovation and technology.

Logobiz and Logomart are both user-friendly logo design software platforms that offer a range of features to help you create professional logos. Sure, here’s a concise article on makeup tips for dusky skin tones focusing on the basics:

### Makeup Tips for Dusky Skin Tones

When it comes to makeup for dusky skin tones, the goal is to enhance your natural beauty while ensuring your makeup looks natural and flattering. Here are some essential tips to help you achieve a flawless look:

#### 1. Foundation
- **Choose a Matte Finish**: Opt for a matte foundation to balance out the natural sheen of dusky skin. Look for formulas that are slightly darker than your skin tone to create a seamless blend.
- **Use a Primer**: Apply a primer to your skin to help the foundation sit smoothly and last longer. A primer that matches your skin tone can also help even out your skin’s texture.

#### 2. Concealer
- **Target Dark Circles and Blemishes**: Use a concealer that is one shade lighter than your foundation to cover dark circles and blemishes. Apply it with a damp beauty sponge or a flat brush to blend it seamlessly.
- **Highlighter**: Apply a touch of highlighter under your cheekbones and along the cupid’s bow to add a subtle glow. This can help brighten your skin and make your features stand out.

#### 3. Blush
- **Choose a Soft Pink or Peach**: For dusky skin tones, a soft pink or peach blush is ideal. It helps to add warmth and a natural flush to your cheeks.
- **Apply in a Circular Motion**: Use a fluffy blush brush to apply blush in a circular motion. Start from the center of your cheek and blend outward to avoid harsh lines.

#### 4. Eyelids
- **Glossy Eyelids**: Apply a sheer, shimmery eyeshadow to your eyelids to give them a glossy finish. This can help to enhance your eye color and make your eyes appear more vibrant.
- **Neutral Eyeliner**: Use a neutral eyeliner to line your upper lash line. A pencil or liquid liner can work well. Apply it with precision to create a subtle, defined look.

#### 5. Lip Shades
- **Soft Pinks and Nudes**: For dusky skin tones, soft pinks and nudes are perfect. They complement the natural undertones of your skin and add a touch of elegance.
- **Apply Lip Gloss**: Finish off your look with a sheer lip gloss in a soft pink or nude shade. This can help to enhance your lip color and make your lips appear fuller.

### Final Touches
- **Set Your Makeup**: Use a setting spray or a translucent powder to set your makeup and ensure it lasts all day.
- **Touch-ups**: Carry a small makeup kit with you to touch up throughout the day. A touch of concealer or a swipe of lip gloss can make a big difference.

By following these simple tips, you can achieve a beautiful and natural makeup look that suits dusky skin tones. Remember, the key is to keep it simple and natural. Enjoy your makeup!

gts:
Photo by Amir Seilsepour on Unsplash

Dusky or Tanned skin has become the desire for many Americans. Not black-brown but a little darker than whitish skin tone. While every skin has its own beauty and glow. To categorize shades of color and makeup ideas, each skin color has attribute a name. Like The dusky tone. Remember there is nothing comparable when the skin is healthy and glowing.

To keep your skin accentuating and glowing, here are some makeup tips to consider to make a good change. Herbeautysecret has been showing some of the best ways to elevate the beauty with regular skin care tips

Photo by Jazmin Quaynor on Unsplash

Foundation

Foundation is the base of any makeup. And for dusky tone, it requires a little extra effort to find the right shade according to their skin tone. Never choose a shade lighter than your natural skin tone, it will make your skin look patch and dull. Foundation is used to create an even base not for brightening.

Concealer

Go for concealer and bronzers too. Add them in your makeup routine, to hide blemishes and highlight the face features. Carry out yourself with pride!

Blush

Its a myth that dusky tone should stay away from blush. Never skip it. Instead use some shades like rose, deep orange and coral. Try to avoid shades like brown and beige, as they won’t suit you. With Dusky tones you have to be a little careful with color choices.

Glossy Eyelids

The best way to highlight your eyes is to use glossy eyelids. Use a cream based eye shadow on your lids in coral, brown, or rose gold shade that will bring out the beauty of your beautiful dark eyes.

Lip Shade

When you choose your lipstick, look for deep and dark colors. The most suited colors like plum, maroon, burgundy and berry goes well with dusky complexion. If you like wearing nude shades, choose one that matches your skin tone. Too light a shade can make your face appear washed-out.

For Travel Professionals

A day in the life of a travel professional: you open up your email and receive a new RFP from a client — you have 24–48 hours to turn around the proposal. In the proposal you need descriptions of supplier offerings, images, and pricing. You also need to ensure you are presenting the most attractive & unique offer to your client so you win the lead. How do you achieve this in a way that doesn’t have you pulling your hair out and losing sleep?

The answer: Reposite’s new Trips marketplace

Travel & event planners responsible for crafting custom & tailored itineraries can leverage the Reposite Trips Marketplace to create listings for each part of the itinerary that they need new suppliers. For example — if you’re pulling together a 9 day custom itinerary for a group of 20 people in New York, but need ideas for dinner venues on the 6th night and group activities on the final day, you could create listings for each of these needs, and get matched with quality suppliers within just a few hours.

Once a listing is published, (whether for a hotel, transportation company, venue, activity, tour guide etc.) all of the matching suppliers within the Reposite network are notified of the need and are able to login and proactively submit their proposal and pricing for the given trip. This enables travel professionals to pick from multiple options, receive competitive pricing quickly, and keep proposals fresh.

Here’s a concise and encouraging article about staying inspired when facing self-doubt, including Martin Luther King’s quote about a stone of hope, Theodore Roosevelt’s “Believe you can” line, and practical tips for building confidence. It also includes a personal example about overcoming stage fear during a presentation and a paragraph about how inspiring others by solving real-world problems can fuel your own motivation.

---

**Staying Inspired When Facing Self-Doubt**

Self-doubt can be a common obstacle on the path to achieving your goals. It’s natural to feel uncertain, especially when the stakes are high. However, with the right mindset and strategies, you can overcome these doubts and stay inspired. One powerful quote that resonates with many is from Martin Luther King Jr., who said, “The arc of the moral universe is long, but it bends toward justice.” This quote serves as a reminder that even the smallest actions can contribute to a larger, more just world. Similarly, Theodore Roosevelt’s famous saying, “The credit belongs to the person who is actually in the arena,” encourages us to step into the challenges and make a difference.

### Practical Tips for Building Confidence

1. **Set Small Goals**: Break your larger goals into smaller, manageable tasks. Achieving these small goals can boost your confidence and motivate you to tackle bigger challenges.
2. **Practice Mindfulness**: Spend a few minutes each day focusing on your breath and being present. Mindfulness can help reduce anxiety and increase your focus.
3. **Visualize Success**: Imagine yourself succeeding in your goals. Visualize the steps you need to take and the outcomes you desire. This can help you feel more prepared and confident.
4. **Seek Feedback**: Ask for feedback from trusted friends, mentors, or colleagues. Constructive criticism can provide valuable insights and help you improve.
5. **Celebrate Small Wins**: Acknowledge and celebrate your achievements, no matter how small they may seem. This can reinforce positive behaviors and keep you motivated.

### Personal Example: Overcoming Stage Fear

One of the most challenging experiences I faced was giving a presentation at a conference. The thought of standing in front of a large audience made me incredibly nervous. However, I knew that the content was important, and I wanted to share it with others. To prepare, I practiced my presentation multiple times in front of friends and family. I also visualized the audience clapping and responding positively. On the day of the presentation, I took deep breaths and reminded myself of the small wins I had achieved. When I stepped onto the stage, I felt a mix of excitement and nervousness, but I was ready to share my message.

### Inspiring Others by Solving Real-World Problems

Inspiring others by solving real-world problems can be a powerful way to fuel your own motivation. When you see the impact of your work, it can be incredibly rewarding and motivating. For example, imagine you are working on a project to reduce plastic waste. Here’s a short article about when Bitcoin mining will end and the upcoming halving event:

### When Bitcoin Mining Will End: A Closer Look

Bitcoin mining is a crucial process that secures the Bitcoin network and generates new Bitcoin tokens. As of the time of writing, approximately 18.89 million out of the total 21 million Bitcoin have been mined. This leaves just 2.11 million Bitcoin left to be mined, which is expected to be completed by the year 2024.

#### The Halving Event in 2024

One of the most significant events in Bitcoin’s history is the halving event, which occurs approximately every four years. The halving event halves the reward miners receive for validating transactions on the network. The first halving took place in 2012, the second in 2016, and the third in 2020. The next halving is scheduled for 2024, where the reward for mining a block will be reduced from 6.25 Bitcoin to 3.125 Bitcoin.

#### The Impact of the Halving

The halving event has several implications for Bitcoin mining. First, it reduces the profitability of mining for individuals and pools. As the reward decreases, the cost of electricity and hardware becomes a larger portion of the overall mining expenses. This can lead to a shift in mining operations towards more efficient setups and potentially towards more centralized mining pools.

Second, the halving event can affect the overall security of the network. With fewer miners, the network becomes more vulnerable to attacks. However, the Bitcoin community has shown resilience, and the network has been able to maintain its security despite the reduction in mining power.

#### Post-Halving: Relying on Transaction Fees

After the halving event, miners will rely more on transaction fees to generate revenue. As the number of transactions on the network increases, the fees can become a significant source of income for miners. This shift in revenue model means that miners will need to adapt their strategies to maximize their earnings from transaction fees.

### Conclusion

The end of Bitcoin mining is expected to occur around 2024, with the next halving event scheduled for that year. This event will significantly impact the profitability and security of the network. As miners adapt to the changing landscape, the focus will shift towards maximizing revenue from transaction fees. Whether this transition will lead to a more decentralized or centralized mining landscape remains to be seen, but one thing is certain: the future of Bitcoin mining is closely tied to the ongoing evolution of the network.
</response>
gts:
Photo by André François McKenzie on Unsplash

Recently, the cryptocurrency Bitcoin reached 90 percent of its maximum offer. A study conducted by blockchain.com revealed that of the total distribution of 21 million Bitcoins, 18.89 million have already been mined and distributed to the market. The milestone comes almost 12 years after the first block, which consisted of 50 Bitcoins, was dug on January 9, 2009.

Bitcoin founder Satoshi Nakamoto has set the value of Bitcoin at 21 million, making cryptocurrency scarce for controlling inflation that may result from the unlimited supply. Bitcoin is “mined” by miners who solve math problems to verify and validate the transaction block that takes place on its network. It is a process of adding new Bitcoins to the stream. After making a successful transaction set, the miner is rewarded with a Bitcoins block.

It should be noted that every four years the value of Bitcoin mining is being halved. So, when Nakamoto created Bitcoin, the reward for securing a block of transactions was 50 Bitcoins. In 2012- 25 Bitcoins and dropped to 12.5 in 2016 and by the end of 2024 miners are expected to earn only 1.56 Bitcoins. This process is called splitting and will continue until the last Bitcoin is mined.

It may seem that the world’s most popular cryptocurrency is on the verge of collapse, but from the halving schedules, it is predicted that the remaining 10 percent of bitcoins will continue until February 2140, according to blockchain.com.

After reaching 21 million, Bitcoin will be very scarce and miners will rely on transaction funds, instead of block earnings. Miners will start to earn more from the transactions that take place on these blockchains than the mines themselves.

It is noteworthy that Bitcoin is not just a cryptocurrency, but a blockchain network that processes transactions in a distributed platform. Therefore, has a lot more to use than just a crypto asset.

gts:
I streamed VALORANT non-stop since June 2nd 2020. In the 5 months since its release I prolly took a total of 5 days off. It was insane. I’d grind unrated. Then ranked got released and I stayed up till 5am just to be one of the first players to experience ranked. It was hell.

I calibrated Platinum 2. I think. I was determined to become the first Radiant in my region. Obviously that didn’t happen, but as I was grinding with ApexSG and anobrain I found this sort of new love for the game.

It was just… fun.

Playing every single day for 3 months straight I was bound to regain my long lost CS skills. I had made a reputation for myself as a Reyna abuser. No, THE Reyna abuser. The whole country would be like “oh shit it’s the Reyna abuser…” when they see me in their game, but anytime I play something like Omen or Jett, they’d see me as a boosted Immortal.

Apparently that was enough for some of the pro teams to consider me. Specifically two teams, whom each had an underaged player that couldn’t participate in the very first official VALORANT tournament by Riot Games. These two teams had approached me and asked me to stand in for them, and that was when my competitive spirit that I had buried since I was forced into early retirement resurfaced.

---

**Dental X-rays: What They Are, How They Work, and Why They’re Important**

Dental X-rays are an essential part of maintaining good oral health. These images help dentists detect problems that might not be visible during a regular check-up. Whether you’re a parent or a concerned patient, understanding what dental X-rays are, how they work, and why they’re important can help you make informed decisions about your dental care.

### What Are Dental X-rays?

Dental X-rays are a series of images taken of your teeth and jaw. They use a small amount of radiation to create detailed pictures of your teeth, bones, and soft tissues. These images allow dentists to see things like cavities, broken teeth, and areas of the jaw that may be impacted or infected.

### How Do Dental X-rays Work?

During a dental X-ray, a machine called an X-ray machine is used to take pictures of your teeth and jaw. The X-ray machine emits a small amount of radiation, which is absorbed by the tissues in your mouth. The radiation is then detected by a special film or digital sensor, creating an image of your teeth and jaw. The dentist or dental assistant will then review the images to identify any issues.

### Why Are Dental X-rays Important?

Dental X-rays are crucial for maintaining good oral health. They help dentists detect problems early, which can lead to better treatment outcomes. For example, X-rays can show cavities that are too small to be seen with the naked eye, as well as issues like gum disease and bone loss. Regular dental X-rays are especially important for children and pregnant women, as they can help identify and treat issues that may affect their developing teeth and bones.

### Safety Concerns

While dental X-rays are safe, it’s important to understand the safety measures in place. Digital X-rays, which use less radiation than traditional X-rays, are generally considered safer. They are particularly beneficial for children and pregnant women, as they can help reduce the risk of radiation exposure. However, it’s still important to follow the safety protocols recommended by your dentist, such as using lead aprons to shield your body from the radiation.

### Myths About Dental X-rays

One common myth is that kids don’t need dental X-rays. This is not true. Children’s teeth are more susceptible to cavities and other dental issues, and regular X-rays can help dentists detect and treat these problems early. Another myth is that dental X-rays are only necessary if you have pain or a visible issue. In reality, dental X-rays are an important part of a routine dental check-up, and they can help prevent serious dental problems from developing.

### Conclusion

Dental X-rays are a valuable tool for maintaining good oral health. They allow dentists to detect problems early and provide better treatment outcomes. While dental X-rays use a small amount of radiation, digital X-rays are generally considered safer and are particularly beneficial for children and pregnant women. By understanding what dental X-rays are, how they work, and why they’re important, you can make informed decisions about your dental care.

---

This article is friendly and informative, avoiding overly technical terms and focusing on safety concerns for kids and pregnant patients. It also includes a myth about kids needing X-rays being unnecessary.
</response>

**Engage-to-Earn (E2E) vs. Play-to-Earn (P2E): A Closer Look at MetaHIVE-VISHV Collaboration**

In the world of blockchain gaming, two popular models have emerged: Play-to-Earn (P2E) and Engage-to-Earn (E2E). While both models leverage the power of blockchain to reward players for their engagement, they differ significantly in their approach and potential for earning rewards. One notable collaboration that highlights the differences between these models is the MetaHIVE-VISHV project.

**P2E: The Basics**

Play-to-Earn models typically involve players earning tokens or rewards by simply playing a game. For example, in a P2E game, players might earn tokens by completing quests, defeating enemies, or participating in various in-game activities. The rewards are often tied to the game’s in-game economy, and players can use these tokens to purchase in-game items or even real-world goods.

**E2E: The Focus on Engagement**

Engage-to-Earn, on the other hand, places a greater emphasis on player engagement. In E2E models, players are rewarded not just for playing but for actively engaging with the game’s ecosystem. This can include exploring new areas, completing complex missions, or participating in community-driven events. The MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration is a prime example of an E2E model in action.

**MetaHIVE-VISHV Collaboration: E2E in Action**

The MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration is a prime example of how E2E models can be implemented. In this project, players are rewarded with MetaHIVE (MHIVE) tokens for exploring the VISHV Space via the MetaHIVE portal. The VISHV Space is a vast, immersive virtual world where players can engage in various activities, from scientific research to cultural exploration. By participating in these activities, players not only earn MHIVE tokens but also contribute to the growth and development of the VISHV ecosystem.

**Examples from MetaHIVE-VISHV**

One of the most compelling examples of E2E engagement is the VISHV Space exploration program. Players who explore different areas of the VISHV Space are rewarded with MHIVE tokens. These tokens can be used to unlock new areas, purchase rare items, or even participate in exclusive events. The VISHV Space is designed to be a living, breathing environment where players can contribute to the project’s success by exploring, documenting, and sharing their findings.

**Benefits of E2E Models**

E2E models offer several advantages over P2E models. Firstly, they create a more dynamic and engaging gaming experience. Players are motivated to explore and engage with the game’s ecosystem, leading to a more immersive and enjoyable experience. Secondly, E2E models can foster a sense of community and collaboration among players. By working together to explore and contribute to the VISHV Space, players can build lasting connections and create a shared sense of purpose.

**Conclusion**

In conclusion, while both P2E and E2E models have their merits, E2E models like the MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration offer a more engaging and rewarding experience for players. By focusing on player engagement and rewarding active participation, E2E models can create a more dynamic and sustainable gaming ecosystem. Whether you’re a casual player or a dedicated explorer, the MetaHIVE-VISHV collaboration is a great example of how E2E models can be implemented to create a more immersive and rewarding gaming experience.

It’s hard to even start this text about my first impressions as I have a lot of them.

A lot of good impressions.

Since I arrived, I was always in motion, doing something, going somewhere, meeting someone. I didn’t have much time alone reminiscing and recollecting my thoughts.

Now after a week I’m settling down a bit and soon I’ll be writing and posting more texts and stories of my life here in Brazil.

My goal is to write a text every week about my Brazilian experience. I’ll be doing my best to overcome my shyness, in order to write, to record and to share my life with anyone who might be interested.

This is what it all started…

First of all I can’t even begin to express my gratitude to the amazing people from @keric_cadca, @associazioneinco, @avesol.associacao and @icyebrasil for allowing me to get this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.

I feel truly blessed and thankful that I am able to go for this exchange and work on Globers Project financed by the Erasmus+ program of the European Union and call Brazil, this spectacular country, my home for the next 12 months.
